instructions: Mix half an ounce of Goldshlager with half an ounce of Bailey's Irish Cream in a regular shot glass and stir.

title: Pio's Beating Stick
instructions: Add ingredients in order, JD first, then pineapple juice, and finally the orange juice. Don't sip, shoot the whole shot at once.

title: The Jaw
instructions: Mix them all together.

title: Shazam Shooter
instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake to chill. Strain out ice and pour into glass.

title: Russian Bloody Mary
instructions: Pour vodka into glass, the carefully add the tomato juice so that it falls to the bottom of the glass. Last, add a couple of drops of tabasco sauce.

title: Pineapple Monyca
instructions: Just stir it a little!

title: Banana Tropical
instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend for 3 minutes. If the mix isn't liquid enough (depends on the banana), add another shot of pineapple juice. Decorate with a piece of the banana and a piece of a pineapple.

title: Green Cow #2
instructions: Stir.

title: Kahlua Bomb
instructions: Mix all of the ingredients well.

title: Lolita
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and add one or two ice cubes.

title: Safari Juice
instructions: Add Cointreau and Midori Melon Liqueur to stirring glass and top up with orange juice. Stir threee or four times rapidly and pour drink into cocktail glass. Add grenadine one drop at a time and garnish with tropical fruits.

title: Tsunami #2
instructions: Place kiwi slice in the bottom of the glass. Add alcohols. Fill with Mountain Dew

title: Crooked Monkey
instructions: Fill beer mug with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

title: Peach Passion
instructions: Fill mixer/glass half full of ice. Pour liquor in next (highest proof first). Pour pink lemonade in next. Stir and pour into highball glass.

title: Irish Lady
instructions: Pour a near full glass of champagne, add Midori and orange juice.

title: Purple Problem Solver
instructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add vodka, rum, midori, curacao, schnapps, and sweet and sour. Fill with pineapple juice and add grenadine to turn it purple.

title: Fruit of the Loom
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass.

title: Windy Beach
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

title: Almost Heaven
instructions: Build in a collins glass over ice.

title: Bourbon Slush
instructions: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve, take out of freezer and put desired amount in blender for a second or put in a bowl and mix till it is semi-liquified. Serve in old fashioned glasses.

title: Siberian Slider
instructions: mix equal parts into a tumber filled with cracked ice. Stir liberally and sip slowly.

title: Baby Doll
instructions: Stir liquors and juice over ice gently. Sugar rim of chilled cocktail glass and strain.

title: 44D
instructions: Pour each into shot glass and top with Grenadine.

title: Cement Kicker
instructions: Fill one shot glass with Bailey's. Fill second shot glass with Lime and 151. To Drink: Pour Bailey's into mouth, do not swallow. Pour Lime and 151 into mouth. Shake head back and fourth, the shot will turn solid.

title: Windjammer
instructions: Stir first three ingredients together and pour over ice. Top with a marischino cherry.

title: Fruit Sensation
instructions: Fill glass with ice add all the ingredients- mix well add straw and garnish if required.

title: Limelight
instructions: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: Dong
instructions: Chill and strain together into shot glass

title: Quikster's Delight
instructions: Start off by totally filling hurricane glass with ice. Next pour rum. Fill glass with equally parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Top with grenadine.

title: Red nail
instructions: Mix the vodka and the Campari in a cocktailglass. Put in 4 ordinary icecubes. Let the drink "rest" seven minutes before served.

title: Leah's Last Hope #2
instructions: Add Ice, Mix, and Enjoy.

title: Fuzzy Melonberry
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice

title: The Miki
instructions: Put the ice on the glass first and then pour the Campari. The grapefruit juice is next. The soda is the last ingredient to add. Stir only once.

title: Strawberry Zima
instructions: Pour Zima in any glass in which it fits, add strawberry syrup and stir.

title: Kahlodster
instructions: Pour each shot in cup filled with ice. Shake three times and serve.

title: Liquid Sword
instructions: Mix liquors in tall glass with ice, fill with Orange Juice

title: Shamrock #2
instructions: Pour ingredients in a cocktail glass.

title: Bogomip
instructions: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

title: Lani
instructions: Pour Passoa and grapefruit juice into a glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

title: Orange Flamingo
instructions: First fill glass 4/5 of the way up with orange soda. Then add your grenadine. Finally add the whipped cream to the top.

title: Stockholm "75"
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the vodka, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with an organce twist.

title: The Naked Lady
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

title: The Irresistible Manhattan
instructions: Combine the ingredients in a small pitcher and add 1 tsp of juice from your jar of maraschino cherries. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry or slice of orange.

title: P.S.U. Victory Dance
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in blender. Fill beer mug with cracked ice and pour contents of blender into mug. For a Frozen Victory Dance, just add cracked ice to blender when mixing until drink appears to be slushey. Enjoy!

title: Fuzzy Irishman
instructions: Pour Raspberry first, Butterscotch next and Irish cream last. Need not be layered but pour in order given. Top 'O the Mornin' to you!

title: Tequila Gimlet
instructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: Franziska
instructions: Heat and stir until the honey is dissolved.

title: Cranberry Margarita
instructions: Add all ingredients into blender with ice. Blend until smooth.

title: Slime
instructions: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

title: The Swamp Water
instructions: Pour over ice, shake and strain!

title: Electric Banana
instructions: Pour ingredigents in glass then shake vigourisly

title: Watermelon Shot
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain and pour into shot glass.

title: Frenchie
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.

title: Belgian Brownie
instructions: Pour the gin, cognac and chocolate liqueur over the ice cubes. Fill with heavy cream. Stir gently.

title: Mexican Rose
instructions: Shake & strain into glass or blend.

title: Mint Chocolate
instructions: Mix in shot glass

title: Grand Mimosa
instructions: Pour Grand Marnier into a Champagne Flute. Fill almost to the top with Champagne and top off with fresh Orange Juice.

title: '57 Chevy #2
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

title: Butterball
instructions: Add Amaretto first and then layer Butterscotch schnapps on top, don't mix. Add whipped cream if desired.

title: Tropical Lust
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add gin and vodka. Almost fill with pineapple juice, then add SoCo and melon liqueur. The drink can also be made frozen by adding 1 1/2 scoops of ice and blending.

title: Fuzzy Screw Shot
instructions: Pour a double shot glass half full of vodka. Pour the peach schnapps into the next quarter. Pour the triple sec in the reamaining quarter. Stir and shoot.

title: Southern Salutation
instructions: Add 2 oz. of Sothern Comfort and 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps to a highball glass. Next add ice and top off with lemonade.

title: Frisky
instructions: Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.

title: Fig
instructions: shake well, pour into shot glass.

title: Drunk Watermelon
instructions: Cut a hole in the top of the watermelon and pour all of the vodka in the watermelon. Put the watermelon (hole upwards) in the fridge for one day before eating.

title: Nina's Special
instructions: Mix all the ingredients together for an even blending.

title: Venus on the Rocks
instructions: The finished drink should be the golden color of perfectly tanned skin. Use this as a guide and don't get hung up on volume measurements.

title: Widow Maker
instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add first three ingredients into glass and shake to mix them together. Add the 2 drops of grenadine for the red hourglass on the bottom of the Widow Maker spider.

title: Celebration
instructions: In a cocktail shaker add ingredients and fill with ice. Shake with gusto for half a minute, and pour/strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel, or lime peel if you use fresh lime juice.

title: Special K
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

title: Irish Dawg
instructions: Put vodka in first. then add the Baley's and cream. lightly stir and serve.

title: Banderas
instructions: Align the shot glasses in the following order: Tomato (red), Tequila (white) and Lemon (green), resembling the Mexican Flag. Quickly gulp one after another: Tomato, Tequila and finally finish with the Lemon.

title: Orange Mule
instructions: Add into glass over ice and mix well. Garnish with slice of lemon.

title: China White
instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake, strain into shot glass.

title: Perfect Manhattan
instructions: Swirl with ice to chill and pour.

title: Moose Piss
instructions: Get a clean five gallon pail and mix all the ingredients together with a ladle. Serve with or without a little ice.

title: Jim's Nuts
instructions: Equal parts Jim Beam and Amaretto over rocks. Stir.

title: Stevie Wonder
instructions: Pour in the order given and enjoy

title: Voodoo Sunrise
instructions: Add 1 shot of white rum and 1 shot of Vodka too a tall glass. Tilt the glass and add 1-2 ounces of Grenadine while pouring down the inside of the glass. Fill with cold orange juice

title: Hairy Armpit
instructions: Place three ice cubes in glass. Pour in ouzo and fill with fresh grapefruit juice. Stir well and serve.

title: Apple Blossom
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass nearly filled with ice. Stir. Strain into an old fassion glass over ice. Garnish with fruit.

title: Pine Cone
instructions: In a tall glass, on the rocks, add Southern Comfort and Amaretto. Fill glass with Pineapple juice. Stir.

title: Adam's Apple
instructions: Mix the ingredients in a tall glass.

title: Kiss From Rudy
instructions: Pour alchol first, add juices, then grenadine and cream, garnish with cherry or pineaple wedge.

title: Red Devil
instructions: First add ice, then mix in the alcohols, then the juice and grenadine. Shake when all ingredients are mixed. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

title: Mutual Orgasm
instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Alternately pour to another glass 3 or 4 times until chilled.

title: Lanette
instructions: Pour vodka, ice, and cranberry juice. Fill with OJ.

title: Caribbean Ice Tea
instructions: Mix all of the ingredients together and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange.

title: Burnso Tropical
instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

title: Thunder Peel
instructions: Shake it all chill and serve

title: The Captains Silver Sunrise
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice: Capt. Morgan Silver - Parrot Bay - orange juice - cranberry juice.

title: Grog #2
instructions: Pour beer, vodka, and orange juice in pitcher. Stir well.

title: Aladdin Sane
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Shake, allow to chill for 5 minutes, re-shake, and pour into a martini glass.

title: Spanish Coffee #2
instructions: Mix congac, kaluha, and espresso in a parfait glass and stir gently. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

title: White Lady 1910
instructions: Shake vigourously with plenty of ice

title: Seelbach Cocktail
instructions: Add bourbon, bitters, and triple sec first. Fill rest of glass with champagne. Depending on the size up your flute, you might need to put less bourbon in. Garnish with orange twist.

title: Crystal Cranberry
instructions: Fill glass half full with ice and add the vodka.Put in the cranberry and orange juice next, then float the other liquors. Add grenadine to color, mix and garnish with a straw and a lemon.

title: Charro Negro
instructions: Rub rim of glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Put 4 ice cubes into the glass, add Tequila and juice of half a lemon. Add some more salt if you like and fill the glass with Coca-COla. Stir gently.

title: Lui Lui
instructions: Mix with ice. Strain into shot glass.

title: Espresso Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass. It should be somewhat frothy.

title: Purple People Eater
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

title: Anton's Ecto Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

title: Ruby Slipper
instructions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full of whiskey and then top off the shot with Grenadine. Fill any large glass with 7-up. Drop the shot glass into the 7-up and then chug the ehtire mixture.

title: Surfer On Acid #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake with ice, strain.

title: Pine-Sol Shooter
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass nearly filled with ice. Stir, and strain into a shot glass

title: Sex on the Brain
instructions: Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.

title: Nipple on Fire
instructions: First put in ButterScotch, then Firewater, and float the Irish Cream

title: Jose Flame-O
instructions: First put Tequila in shot glass, then add Firewater

title: Holy Water
instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

title: Catfish
instructions: Serve it chilled up.

title: Southern Blast
instructions: Just pour it all in a glass. Stir it if you really feel the need to. I usually just pour in the alcohol and let the fruit juice do the mixing for me. For the best results, try and use that Minute Maid Fruit Punch. That stuff works very well. I advise against using any sort of "all-citrus" fruit juice, even OJ.

title: The Gold, The Bad, and The Ugly
instructions: When you're filling with milk, make sure you leave enough room for the Goldschlager. Pour the Goldschlager over the back of a spoon.

title: Black Hole
instructions: Fill glass 2/3 with ice, add Sambuca and fill with soda.

title: R-Float
instructions: Pour ingredients in a frosted mug over ice and stir.

title: Summer Dreams
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice in shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass Garnish with lemon and pinapple pieces

title: Norling Special
instructions: Pour Midori and Bacardi Limon in a highball glass and fill 1/2 the glass with cruched ice. Fill with in 1 part 7-up and 1 part cranberry juice.

title: Class Act
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shker of ice, shake, then strain into a rocks glass full of ice. Drinker will have to constantly mix the drink in his glass as the Advocaat will settle.

title: Fuzzy Faser
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a huge bowl or an empty water bottle that holds several gallons. Stir or shake until mixed and serve either on ice or as a shot.

title: Citrus Smack
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add rum, triple sec, and sour mix. Fill remainder of glass with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with orange and lemon wedges.

title: Steamboat
instructions: Mix all ingredience, strain into glass, and enjoy!

title: Novebuche
instructions: Stir and serve.

title: Angry Chameleon
instructions: Disolve kool-Aid in rum. Add Mountain Dew.

title: Misty Loch
instructions: Pour the 3 first ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake, strain into a brandy snifter and add the 2 little dashes of Kahlua.

title: Mage's Fire
instructions: Start with the vodka in a bottle. Mix in the schnapps, then add the curacao. Mix well. This mixture should be chilled at least 24 hours before serving, and is best served cold.

title: Frozen Grasshopper
instructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake.

title: San Juan Cooler
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice Add rum and dry vermouth Fill with pineapple juice and serve

title: The Texas Mudslide
instructions: Put ice in a shaker and pour all three ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously and then strain into a glass. This is intended to be more like a shot than a sipping drink.

title: Arkansas Razorback
instructions: Add all together in a mixing tin with ice, Shake to a froth, and strain off the ice into the glass.

title: Gooseberry Jam
instructions: Take all of the above ingredients, place in a cocktail shaker or blender with plenty of crushed ice. mix untill slightly frothy, then pour into a tall glass and enjoy.

title: Green Tree Frog
instructions: Mix together first three ingredients and then slice fresh limes and place in drink, then allow to sit for at least one hour. This drink is to be made in a large quantity, so the limes may "take effect."

title: Cristianne
instructions: Pour Blue Curacao in a champagne flute, followed by Vodka and White Wine. Then pour Grenadine. Don't shake it!

title: Sunny Mexico
instructions: Simple! Fill half the shot with (white) tequila and top it up with Galliano

title: Viagra Shot
instructions: Blend, add ice and strain into glass.

title: Sweet Passoa
instructions: Fill half of the glass with ice and stir.

title: Pink Passion
instructions: Build drink in a higball glass as listed. Use lots of ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedges.

title: Banshee Berry
instructions: pour each of the three ingredients into a shot glass. Stir.

title: Razzleberry
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and serve.

title: Southern Comfort Sour
instructions: Can be made 'up' or 'on the rocks' Prepare sour glass. Add Southern Comfort and sour mix to mixing glass. Shake well (8-10 times) and strain into glass providing lots of foam. Add flag or butterfly (orange and cherry on a pick) as garnish.

title: Santorini Sundown
instructions: Shake and strain the drink into a well chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

title: Firecracker
instructions: Fill the shot glass close to the top with Wild Turkey and add 4 dashes of tabasco sauce.

title: San Diego Silver Bullet
instructions: Shake the ingredients over ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve. Down it in one.

title: Wu Wu
instructions: Pour vodka over ice. Add equal amounts of orange and cranberry juices and serve.

title: Jersey Shore Cherry Lemonade
instructions: Add sugar, vodka, and sour mix over ice and shake. Then fill with sprite/7up. Top with grenadne or cherry juice. Garnish with cherry and lemon wedge.

title: Nasty Pablo
instructions: Use a pint glass filled with ice. First add the vodka, then the blackberry brandy. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

title: Colorado Cider
instructions: Combine all ingredients in small snifter. Sip slowly or take as a shot.

title: Blue Blazer #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour in Old-fashioned glasses with a spoon in it (to prevent the glass from breaking if the drink is too hot).

title: Gloom Raiser
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.

title: Green Tea
instructions: Mix Chartreuse and Sour Mix on top of ice in Collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and, if you like, garnish with lemon or lime slice.

title: Chartreuse and Tonic
instructions: In glass filled with ice, mix Chartreuse and Tonic water. Garnish with lime slice.

title: Papaya Milk Splash
instructions: Make sure to clean out the seeds and deskin the papaya. Put the papaya along with all other ingredients in a blender, mix at medium to high speed for about one to two minutes. Serve immediately.

title: Long Slow Comfortable Screw Against the Wall
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass.

title: Kahlua Sour
instructions: Mix Kahlua and lemon juice, add sugar and enjoy.

title: The Kristy
instructions: Put all together in a glass and stir. May put ice cubes in after mixed, or put in blender to make frozen drink.

title: The Kristy #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass. Add ice. If frozen drink is preferred, use more ice and mix in blender.

title: Full Moon
instructions: Tilt snifter and pour amaretto. While still tilting snifter, pour Grand Marnier. Gently "roll" snifter in the tilted position, set upright, and enjoy sipping!

title: Drunk on Christmas
instructions: Mix and shake Irish whiskey, Midori, and Apple Schnapps with ice. Fill whiskey sour glass with ice. Strain mixture over ice in glass. Fill with sweet and sour. Garnish with several free floating Maraschino cherries

title: Pi�a Rita
instructions: Shake over ice. Serve in sugar rimmed glass with shaved ice in it . Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

title: Sailor Venus
instructions: Shake and strain to pousse cafe glass. Garnish with a peel of lemon.

title: Sailor Moon
instructions: Shake white rum, Charleston Follies and lemon juice with ice. Strain over ice in an old fashioned glass. Fill glass with champagne. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

title: Sailor Mercury
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

title: Ramos Fizz #1
instructions: Blend all ingredients except soda and orange slice in a blender until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

title: Fruit A la la
instructions: Put all together in blender, and blend until smooth.

title: Ramos Fizz
instructions: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda, to taste.

title: Moose Fart
instructions: Add with ice in a blender, and blend to a thick consistency.

title: Milky Nooky
instructions: Shake and serve

title: Homecoming
instructions: Fill rocks glass with ice, add Amaretto and Baileys and serve with a stirrer.

title: The Classic
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain in a cooled cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry on a stick.

title: Zool
instructions: Pour 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps in the shot glass first. Then pour 1 oz. of Absolut Vodka on top. Last pour Amaretto on top of Vodka until the Vodka changes in to a light brown.

title: Greasy Swede
instructions: Mix together and serve - Do not chill or add ice.

title: Swamp Water #2
instructions: Shake or blend with ice, strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.

title: Delta Sunset
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

title: Kahlua Kiss
instructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Fill half the glass with Kahlua. Add a dash of Creme de Noyaux. Top with Cream.

title: Oklahoma Tropical Twister
instructions: Place both cans of Cream of Coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. Then pour the Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice, Cream of Coconut, and Grenadine in a large punch bowl. Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. You can add the liqour in with the mix or add it to each drink as it is poured. 1.5 oz per 12 oz drink. By leaving out the Spiced Rum the kids can drink this as well. It is a great NAB drink. Serve over crushed ice. Place the Pineapple Wedge, Orange Wedge, and the Cherry on a tooth pick and drop in drink. For a Oklahoma Frozen Twister place all the ingredients in a blender with a 12 oz cup of ice and blend til smooth. Then add garnish.

title: White Splash
instructions: Add the cola slowly to the Pina Colada.

title: Green Thing
instructions: Shake well till it is a cream color and is frothing.

title: The Green Wave
instructions: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Chill and strain into glass. Serve immediately.

title: Liberty Blue Champagne
instructions: Shake first 4 ingredients over ice and strain in sugar rimed champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

title: London Fog
instructions: Shake Gin and Pernod with cracked ice. Strain into a red wine glass packed with shaved ice.

title: Quick Fox
instructions: Layer each ingredients onto one another

title: Rugmuncher
instructions: Shake both ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

title: The Velvet Kilt
instructions: Chill cocktail glass and pour ingredients into mixer. Shake until cold and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry or small butterscotch candy.

title: Chocalate Covered Martini
instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Mix Vodka, Godiva, and Vanilla Schnapps. Stir, do not shake. Place single cherry with stem in chilled cocktail glass. Strain over cherry.

title: Mystery Date
instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain. Garnish with 1/4 of a strawberry.

title: Quantum Theory
instructions: Pour Rum, Strega, and Grand Marnier into collins glass. Add Pineapple and Sweet and Sour until full. Garnish with a Lemon Cherry Flag.

title: Lewinsky
instructions: Pour together in shot glass and serve. Very easy to do.

title: Tiger Paw
instructions: Add vodka, lemon juice, ice, and sugar in a mixing glass and shake. Pour into a cup and add orange soda. Stir.

title: Hawaii Five-O
instructions: Add all ingredients on top of ice in the highball glass.

title: Blue in the Face
instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add liquors. Add sugar and tonic to taste. Stir.

title: Pisang Pistace
instructions: Shake well with 5-6 icecubes and serve in a cocktailglass with 2 icecubes.

title: Desiree
instructions: Serve on the rocks. Optional garnish: lemon or lime twist.

title: Bob's Special Punch
instructions: Add them all together in any order you wish, just make sure you stir it all together well.

title: Bag of Filth
instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour pernod and Tia Maria into glass. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker and give shaker a rapid 3 second shake. Pour contents back into glass.

title: Lady L
instructions: Shake with 4 oz. 7-Up and a splash of pineapple juice. Pour into tall glass over crushed ice. Color top with a splash of cherry syrup, add cherry for garnish.

title: Warm and Fuzzy
instructions: Pour southern comfort, triple sec, and then cherry brandy

title: Black Fruit Tree
instructions: Add all ingredients to glass with ice and stir.

title: Braindead
instructions: Fill the shaker half with ice cubes, and add the incredients. Shake well. Serve in a shot glass.

title: Slapshot
instructions: Stir well before adding whipped cream.

title: Fire And Ice
instructions: Layer the Rumple Minze on top of the Firewater (as best as possible)

title: Porky Bone
instructions: Let all the maple syrup collect at the bottom of the glass, then lightly mix the other ingredients over it. A few ice cubes can be added when it's done.

title: Buttered Toffee
instructions: Pour amaretto, irish cream, and Kahlua over ice cubes. Add half-and-half, and stir well.

title: D-Roy
instructions: Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.

title: Flori's Hot Tub Heaven
instructions: Please add in order from light to heavy finishing with coffee. No mixing required.

title: Super Allez
instructions: Begin by pouring in the fruit punch. Then add the gin. Next, pour the orange juice in followed by the Sprite.

title: Santa Maria
instructions: Combine all ingredients except orange in shaker with ice. Shake gently, and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange slice.

title: Alien Urine
instructions: This drink is ideally made in a 16 ounce glass, but can also be made in a Collins glass. The drink is served on the rocks. Add the Midori, Malibo, and Schnaps. Add juices. Shake in a tin. Garnish with either two cherries or with a kiwi wheel.

title: Slushy
instructions: Mix drink with crushed ice or blend with 2 1/2 scoops of ice. For added enjoyment stick a straw in the middle and drink for a slushy rush.

title: Dirty Monkey
instructions: Mix in order listed. Do not stir. Serve in Brandy Snifter.

title: Log Cabin
instructions: Shake all ingredients but the soda with ice. Strain into highball glass. Fill the glass to the top with the orange soda.

title: Applecake
instructions: Shake well and use it as a shot

title: Barbie Shot
instructions: Shake with ice and strain.

title: Italian Sunset
instructions: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the Amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice and top with club soda to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

title: Cherry Spitfire
instructions: Mix ingredients and top with 151. If too strong add 7-UP or Sprite.

title: Curtain Call
instructions: Add equal parts of Jack Daniels, Midori, and J�germeister into a shot glass. Prechill the alcohol if so desired.

title: Deerslayer
instructions: Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the J�germeister and Windsor, stir, then fill the glass with the 7-Up and give it a small stir.

title: Mundo Fine
instructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough,) Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

title: Shattered Dreams

title: Black River Boogie

title: Tequila Colagallo

title: Double Omega

title: Maple Lake Irish Shock

title: Black Christmas

title: Apple Martini

title: Hoo Doo

title: Rocky Mountain Bumpsucker

title: Scarlett Martini

title: Cajun Comforter
instructions: Pour Sothern Comfort and Bourbon over rocks in a 12-ounce glass. Add a dash of tobasco, or any non-habe�ero pepper sauce (dont go overboard). To really impress, garnish with a jumbo shrimp.

title: Summer Sucker
instructions: Cut a small, circular hole in the watermelon. Save the piece cut out. Turn the watermelon with the hole facing the ground so any juices drip out. Mix the vodka, grenadine and 7-Up in a seperate bowl. Slowly pour the mix into the watermelon (use a funnel if you have one). If you put the liquid too fast into the watermelon, it wont absorb properly. Pop the piece you cut out back into the hole. Shake the melon. Throw it in the fridge for an afternoon. When the family is over, cut slices out of the watermelon and enjoy.

title: 77 Sunset Strip

title: Godiva Polar Bear

title: Snowshot
instructions: Throw all ingredients into blender. Add sugar to taste, sweet lemons dont need more than one cube. Blend until the consistancy resembles a daiquiri.

title: Bittersweet Jack
instructions: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

title: Bot
instructions: The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. However, the really slick way is much more impressive: Add cranberry juice, lime juice, tripple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then, mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix, and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect, and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

title: Southern Sparkler
instructions: Mix ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass, or serve on the rocks into an ordinary glass. Garnish with a flag (confederate).

title: International Jack
instructions: Mix ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

title: Southern Suicide
instructions: Mix ingredients on the rocks.

title: Bad Habit

title: Lucky Seven

title: Sweaty Irish Whiskey

title: Mad Hatter
instructions: Shake and strain, straight up.

title: Bairn

instructions: Layer

instructions: Build.

If done properly, this drink should be frothy for a bit, and then separate as it sits. Serve in cocktail or margarita glasses. It won't hurt to put it in the freezer for a short time (enough to slush it some).

instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice and mix the two ingredients.

title: Moo Moo
instructions: Pour both liquors into glass with ice. Add cream and shake well. Serve with large straw.

title: Fruit Salad Daiquiri
instructions: Fill blender 1/2 to 3/4 with ice and add strawberries, pieces of watermelon, and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.

title: Sunsplash
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon twist.

title: Golden Apple
instructions: Mix the two ingredients in a shot glass.

title: Fuzzy Balls
instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients one part each - and add 7-up. Eight shots of each requires a 2L bottle of 7-up.

title: Nikki Coffee
instructions: Ssing a coffee mug, pour Bailey's and butterscotch into mug. Fill with coffee and stir.

title: The Dash
instructions: Pop a couple of ice cubes in the glass. Pour the advocaat slowly over the ice. Then wait for a moment before adding the creme de fraise. Serve it as soon as it's poured as it starts to curdle.

title: Jimtini
instructions: Shake with ice and serve up in a chilled cocktail glass with a cocoa rim.

title: FU2
instructions: Layer from top to bottom....

title: Cokahlualicious
instructions: Mix the kahlua and coconut liqueur, poor over crushed ice, and sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon on the top. Voila! You can also put this in a blender if you so desire.

title: Crazy Monkey
instructions: combine all ingredients in a blender or Island Oasis machine. Blend and serve in a hurricane. Top with whip cream and garnish with a strawberry and orange.

title: Brimstone
instructions: Shake with cracked ice.

title: Pearl Necklace
instructions: Mix equal parts tequila rose and bailey's in shot glass, shoot! Also try chilled.

title: Sunset (Night Club)
instructions: Splash of Grenadine to flavor, chill/strain shot or can be a drink over ice.

title: Carabinieri
instructions: Shake well with ice, serve in high glass half filled with ice.

title: Rhino
instructions: Layer the three ingredients in that order.

title: Scurvy #2
instructions: Layer the ingredients in a shot glass.

title: Toasted Fisherman
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry

title: Granny Apple Blossom
instructions: Mix apple schnapps, tequila, daiquiri mix in a collins glass filled with ice. Fill to top with 7-up.

title: 8 iron
instructions: Pour equal parts of each in the the shot glass

title: TLA
instructions: Layer in a shot glass with the tequila on the bottom, amaretto in the middle, and a splash of lime juice on top.

title: Mexican Iceberg
instructions: Mix the Tequila and the Yukon Jack together with ice in a large tumbler glass. Add the Triple Sec and then add the lime juice to taste. You can garnish with slice of lime of lemon.

title: Cerebellum

title: Strawberry Kiss
instructions: Add all ingredients (except ice) in the order shown. Stir well. Add ice cubes and serve.

title: Panther Sweat
instructions: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice. Strain into glass. Good with crushed salt on the rim of the glass.

title: Just Shoot Me
instructions: Mix over ice and then pour into a shooter glass

title: Feliz Natal
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in the glass with a couple of ice cubes and enjoy!

title: Mountain Dang
instructions: Fill glass 3/4ths full of Mountain Dew -- No fuller as it will fizz a lot! -- Add Tang to taste. Ice is completely optional

title: Pink Floyd
instructions: Pour Amaretto and Southern Comfort into shaker over ice. Top off glass with equal parts OJ and pinapple juice. Add one splash of grenadine. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

title: Mogadon
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes then add 1oz of Absolut Citron. Fill with 7-Up then splash with fruit juice. Stir.

title: Papa Doble
instructions: Shake rum, grapefruit juice, and lime juice with ice and pour or strain into glass. Add a splash of grenedine.

title: Seaweed
instructions: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

title: Hot Jose
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and enjoy.

title: Thal on the rocks
instructions: Take the highball, put in 3 to 4 ice cubes, add 1 cl of creme de cassis (not cooled), then 4 cl of preferably Absolut Vodka along with 2 cl of Gordon's Dry. Fill in the glass with equal parts of bitter lemon and tonic water, pour and squeeze in one fourth of a lime. Garnish with a pair of cherrys, one in, one outside the glass.

title: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #3
instructions: This drink should be shaken lightly and strained into a 2oz shot glass.

title: Wet Kiss
instructions: Layer the 3 ingredients in the order listed in a shot glass. It is also good over ice in a highball glass.

title: Molotov Cocktail
instructions: Pour a shot of vokda (preferably Russian), float the 151, light, blow out, and take the shot down.

title: Jack-Off
instructions: Pour in one shot of Jack Daniel's on ice, more if you like your drinks strong. Then pour about a half of a can of Coca-Cola on top, leaving room for the iced tea. Finally, fill to the top with very strong iced tea (try three times the amount of powder).

title: Tequila Bay Breeze
instructions: Blend.

title: Suddenly Daylight
instructions: Pour Iced Tea in glass first, then top with the Sweet and Sour, and then add Triple Sec to taste. Stir once and serve.

title: Cucci
instructions: Add ice to glass, drizzle Southern Comfort over the ice. Add lemonade, orange juice and a dash of Cointreau and mix.

title: Extra Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in highball. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

title: Brooklyn Zoo
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix rum vodka, and gin. Add splash of pinepple juice, Razzmatazz, and sourmix. Drinker or assistant pours beer.

title: Branded Nipple
instructions: Float each ingredient over the previous, set on fire, and shoot it!

title: Sigma Nu Ball Buster
instructions: Chill both then mix together!! Can be served over ice or in smaller doses. Experiment, have fun, let us know what you come up with!

title: PB&J
instructions: Combine all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake and strain into shot glass. Serve.

title: Baywatch
instructions: Shake the vodka, the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

title: Gumball Hummer
instructions: Combine equal parts over ice in cocktail shaker. Shake, strain, serve!!

title: Calypso
instructions: Pour directly in the shot glass and mix the ingridients. No need to chill. Serve.

title: Tree Smacker
instructions: Add liqurs, then add juices. Color red with grenidene. Float the 151.

title: Dr Jack
instructions: Mix in glass over ice.

title: Penthouse
instructions: Pour ingredients in the glas. Shoot it down. Have a limewedge afterwards.

title: Kickstand
instructions: Pour in Amaretto and Sothern Comfort, layer Kahlua and Irish cream.

title: Baileyfloat
instructions: fill glass with ice..add Bailey's and root beer. Stir. Serve in frosted beer mug

title: Purple Wind
instructions: Pour Chambord into shot glass. Warm sake on stove then pour into chambord. Drink immediately.

title: Tropical Passion
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass(es).

title: Slow Comfortable Screw on a Dogbox
instructions: Mix all ingredients in mason jar, add ice and enjoy.

title: Snow Snake
instructions: Larger Glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

title: Razberi Kicker
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Stolichnaya Razberi vodka, cranberry juice, a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

title: Peach Tea Cooler
instructions: Mix and serve on the rocks.

title: Sweet Casa Noble
instructions: In Collins glass put ice, pour the tequila and fill with peach juice, finish with a splash of grenadine and a slice of lime.

title: Geisha
instructions: mix first two ingredients: fill with pineapple juice.

title: Canadian Zombie
instructions: Fill Collins glass halfway up with ice. Add white and dark rum. Fill up with half orange- half lemonjuice. Pour grenadine and curacao along rim of glass. Top with 151 proof rum.

title: The BV
instructions: Add ice first, then vodka, OJ and tomato juice. Give a light stir. Enjoy!

title: Ooo
instructions: Serve over ice.

title: The Wedge
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

title: The Lynchmob
instructions: Pour in the sweet and sour, then the amaretto and then Orange soda, and stir

title: Phi Psycho Psycho
instructions: Mix in large punch bowl to your liking.

title: Oxymoron
instructions: Keep the Vodka and Juice at room temperature. Mix them in the glass, and then add the honey. The honey will sink to the bottom. Swirl the drink more or less to vary the amount of honey dissolved.

title: Wile E Coyote
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass

title: Sex On The Beach - Jersey Style
instructions: Makes 1 gallon of punch -- mix all 4 liquers in 1 parts and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice

title: Coo Coo
instructions: In a blender, combine ingredients with ice and enjoy!

title: Barbarian
instructions: Pour root beer into mug. Add a shot of Blackberry Brandy.

title: Eenytini
instructions: Pour blue curacao, gin and 7-Up into a shaker tin filled with ice. Swirl until tin is frosty. Pour into Martini (Cocktail) Glass. Repeat with the cranberry juice and add to glass so that an electric-purple colour is achieved. Garnish with a cherry on a sparkler stick.

title: Longaberger Lemonade
instructions: Combine ingredients in collins glass filled with ice.

title: Four Fine Friends
instructions: Mix together in a shot glass and slam it down.

title: Lorraine's Delight
instructions: Add everything to a blender with 6-10 ice cubes and blend until it is thick and frosty. Pour into a frozen margarita glass.

title: Georgia Peach
instructions: Build on ice.

title: The King Of Denmark

title: Comfort Dry Manhattan
instructions: Combine vermouth, Southern Comfort, and ice in a glass and stir well. strain into cocktail glass.

title: Letitia's Penisbutter Cup
instructions: Combine all ingredients, pour over ice, and enjoy.

title: Titia's Tushie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass, and shake

title: Fridays Frozen Mudslide
instructions: Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed, add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender's highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

title: Bottlecap
instructions: Combine ingredients. May be served on the rocks or chilled and strained as a shot.

title: Phoenix Paradise
instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender and blend for about 20 - 30 seconds. Then pour into a hi-ball glass or a Gibralter 14 oz glass.

title: Monaco
instructions: Start with the grenadine, then beer, then 7up. Stir well on the rocks, and you're good to go.

title: Eagle Eye
instructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.

title: Brittle Fracture
instructions: Mix in no particular order. Serve over ice.

title: Caribbean Bliss
instructions: Use chilled orange juice, but no ice.

title: Carolina Iced Tea
instructions: Add alcohol and stir lightly. Pour in iced tea. Stir a few more times and enjoy!

title: Chocolate Bomb
instructions: Put Equal amounts of Kahlua and coconut run in a common 12oz glass. Fill the glass with chocolate milk.

title: Black Lodge
instructions: Start with glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add Triple Sec, Malibu, and Citrus Vodka. Add splash of Rose's lime juice. Fill glass with cola. Stir.

title: Yukon Dew Me
instructions: Just mix and drink.

title: Campari Milkshake
instructions: Pour cold milk in a pot. Slowly add orange juice. Finally add campari. Stir really well. Put ice cubes in glass and pour in milk-shake. Garnish with slice of orange. Serve with straw.

title: Dublin Driver
instructions: Pour Irish Mist and Orange Juice over rocks. Enjoy.

title: Disco Ball
instructions: Mix together over ice, strain into glass.

title: Fruit Tingle #2
instructions: Pour the Blue Curacao and Vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.

title: Centipede
instructions: Combine vodka and rum in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with grapefruit soda and stir gently.

title: The Whole Maryann
instructions: layer over ice, Taste before serving

title: Platinum Grand Margarita
instructions: Salt the rim of your margarita glass and add freshly squeezed lime juice to your glass. Add margarita mix, tequila, grand marnier, cointreau, triple sec, irish mist, and 5 ice cubes in a shaker. Shake vigorously until thoroughly mixed and cold. Pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel. Adding a maraschino cherry is an interesting touch.

title: Sour Death
instructions: Mix with ice and pour into glass.

title: Tinyee's Orange Smoothie
instructions: Put crushed ice into blender, about 2 cups. Add Cointreau. Add fruits, lemon juice and orange juice. Blend. With machine on, pour one half of the soda and reserve for serving. Once blended, pour into glass three-quarters of the way and add remaining soda.

title: Mirage
instructions: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

title: Arizona PowWow
instructions: Mix the three alcohols together and pour into shot glasses leaving enough room to add a little club soda.

title: Sunset Sour
instructions: Mix whiskey and sour mix and pour over ice-filled whiskeysour glass. Slowly add grenadine which will sink to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with orange slices and cherries.

title: Sex on an Arizona Beach
instructions: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

title: Caribbean Breeze
instructions: Shake all ingredients except juice with ice and pour into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with pineapple wedge and a cherry.

title: Apocolypse
instructions: Combine alcohol in a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

title: Magic Woman
instructions: Mix all ingridients and serve over ice.

title: Snakebite Jack
instructions: Fill a pint glass half way with cider, add a dash of blackcurrant cordial, top it up with lager, drink it down a bit (or pour it off) and add a shot of Jack Daniels.

title: Kenny
instructions: Mix the peach vodka with the sprite and some ice cubes.

title: Perfect Kiss
instructions: Put the crushed ice in the glass. Add spirits and top with Sprite. Gently place one half strawberry underneath the layer of crushed ice. Serve.

title: Telegraph
instructions: In a shaker with ice, combine rum and vodka. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled almost to the top with ice. Top off with ginger ale and stir gently.

title: Amor de Cosmos
instructions: Shake rye, grenadine and cranberry juice with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a splash each of ginger ale and club soda. Add a maraschino cherry.

title: Absolut Royal Fuck
instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake, and serve up in a rocks glass.

title: Soviet Sunset
instructions: Pour vodka, triple sec and lime juice over ice. Fill to top with club soda. Stir.

title: Apple Jolly Rancher
instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake. Serve up in rocks glass.

title: Tweaked
instructions: Fill glass 3/4 way full with ice, add Vodka and Southern Comfort, then fill to the top with Root Beer, stir then drink.

title: Twin Sisters
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

title: Green Beret
instructions: pour both ingredients into a shaker, over ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glass.

title: Stubborn Italian
instructions: Pour one shot Sambuca, add a splash of Galliano on top. Light on fire and drink it.

title: Ladder
instructions: Just pour it in your glass

title: Dallas Stars
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

title: Toronto Maple Leafs
instructions: Layer in shot glass.

title: Wayne's World
instructions: Fill the shot glass about 2/3rd's full of Jager, and then top it off with the Sambuca.

title: Lager & Lime
instructions: Pour the beer in first, then add the lime juice. Because the lime juice is heavier than the beer, don't let it sit for a long time. For best results, use "bar lime" (out of the nozzle) instead of real lime juice.

title: Toro
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice filled shaker and shake. Garnish with a cherry.

title: Slaughtering the Slothman
instructions: Shake the Grand Marnier, orange Curacao, freshly squeezed lemon juice and a dash of grenadine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: China Village Mai Tai

title: Rye & Ginger
instructions: Mix together.

title: Tiger Jack
instructions: Pour a measure (depending on sweetness required 1/2 to 1 shot is average) of grenadine into a tall, cool glass. In a cocktail shaker, add ice, 2 shots of Jack, 1 shot of Triple Sec then top up with enough orange juice to fill the glass. Give it a good shake and pour slowly into the glass.

title: Barney on Acid
instructions: Shake and strain into shot glass.

title: Alligator Piss
instructions: Shake, strain into glass

title: Sever St. Special
instructions: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

title: Hot Summer Breeze
instructions: Add ice and mix all together.

title: Screwed Banana
instructions: Put ice in highball glass, about 1/2 full, then pour in the banana liqueur and the Peach Schnapps. Fill with orange juice. Stir.

title: Candied Sever St. Special
instructions: Fill Collins glass most of the way with ice. Add Yukon Jack and Midori. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

title: Coffee Coolata
instructions: Mix coffee, sugar, and milk in a blender and add more of either to taste, then add the ice and crush it until no large chunks are present. Add the Kahlua, and mix if you'd like that.

title: Spicy Martini
instructions: Shake the Gin and Vermouth with ice in a shaker. Pour into a large Martini glass. Pour the tabasco into the finished drink. Stir very lightly.

title: Penalty Shot
instructions: Pour all 3 into shot glass and mix.

title: Mint Condition
instructions: Fill the glass with ice, and pour the ingredients into the glass, stirring with a straw.

title: All Puckered Out
instructions: Add ice and a shot of pucker to the highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Squeeze a wedge of lime and toss it in the glass. Stir.

title: Bent Bum
instructions: Fill Collins Glass with a heaping of ice. Pour in Vodka, Gin, 1/2 of remaining glass with O.J., then rest with Grapefruit. Skake, don't stir. Then add a healthy splah of Coca-cola.

title: Shot of Respect
instructions: Add the tequila and 151 proof rum in a shot glass.Then pour in the tabasco.

title: Barracuda
instructions: Put the liquor in the shot glass equally

title: Coconut Cream Pie
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice shake & strain into cocktail glass.

title: Paddy's Caffeine
instructions: Make sure you put in Tia Maria first (Before Guinness has settled and before you "head" it) as otherwise you will mess-up a perfectly well-settled pint

title: Purple Mexican
instructions: Pour all 3 ingredients into mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into highball glass. Drink like a shooter

title: P.D.C.
instructions: Start with Creme de Menthe, then layer in order, with Baileys last.

title: Liquid Valium
instructions: Fill Glass with Ice, pour liquers, then pour to fill with equal parts Orange and cranberry juice. Shake and serve with Orange and cherry garnish.

title: Mountain Fuck
instructions: Mix in a beer mug.

title: Pierced Nipple
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into shot glass.

title: Jamaican Ten Speed
instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

title: Crazy Janie
instructions: Pour ice into a deep stem glass and pour in Orange vodka. Fill with grapefruit juice, and add a splash of Sprite or Champagne. Stir gently and then comes the "crazy part". Spin the glass and drizzle a few drops of grenadine into the drink to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

title: Tuaca Nutter
instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with chocolate shavings & chopped roast nuts.

title: Mother
instructions: Mix Gin, Vodka, Grenadine, Sour Mix together in shaker and pour into a collins glass with ice. Try to fill to about 1/2 to 3/4 quarters full with the liquor mix. Then top with beer to personal flavor.

title: Jamaican Sunset #2
instructions: Combine the vodka and the coconut rum. Fill with Orange Juice and add a splash of Grenadine. Shake or stir.

title: Alternate Root
instructions: Mix Schnapps and juice in glass of ice. Place in blender. Blend until smooth. Serve in chilled glass.

title: The Dukes Of Hazzard Tonic
instructions: Shake and serve.

title: Less Than Jake on The Rocks
instructions: just put one on top of the other in order shown... then stir

title: Creamy Snatch
instructions: Fill the glass 1/2 with ice. Pour in the Buttershots first, followed slowly by the Kahlua until you're halfway up the glass. (You can allow yourself to be a little more generous with the Buttershots than with the Kahlua). Pour in the half-and-half last, and stir until mixed completely. Serve cold.

title: Deidru
instructions: Add Brandy to glass and fill with Lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.

title: Satin Sheet
instructions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

title: Kokopa
instructions: Layer. Peppermint schnapps first, then the kahlua on top.

title: A Southern Screw
instructions: Pour over ice, stir and serve.

title: Zipper
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and stir to chill. Strain into shot glass.

title: Dr. Raspberry
instructions: Pour Dr. Pepper into glass and add chambord. Stir to mix, and serve chilled.

title: Bittersweet with a twist
instructions: Add all liquid ingrediants to mason jar and add ice to taste. Stir well and add slice of lemon.

title: Madeleine
instructions: Shake all ingredients with 4 ice cubes. And enjoy that drink.

title: The Hurtado
instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass with a lot of ice, shake well and serve.

title: Keoke Coffee
instructions: Mix alcohols, add coffee, top with whipped cream, Enjoy. Good on a cold winters night!

title: Tropical Kermit Piss
instructions: Just pour into a glass and add the softdrink and ice.

title: Dizzy Damage
instructions: Chill ingrediants in mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

title: Indiana Jones
instructions: Add the Whisky and Tequila together, one shot worth combined, then add the same amount of Champagne/Sparkling Wine. Put your hand or a beer mat over the glass, slam it down onto table and then down it in one.

title: Limon and Ginger
instructions: This drink will taste best neat if both the Limon and the ginger ale are chilled, but will also work fine on the rocks.

title: C3PO
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixer. Garnish with 2 orange slices to give impression of C3PO's eyes.

title: Whippersnapper
instructions: Add Rum, Fresca, and 1 or 2 ice cubes.

title: Beth's Own
instructions: Mix alcohol first, then add cola.

title: Ironman
instructions: Mix Seagrem 7 and vodka. Stir. Add a few ice cubes, fill with soda and stir gently.

title: Carribean Dream
instructions: Mix and Add Ice

title: Genuine Singapore Sling
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker, fill with ice and shake until the shaker is well frosted. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

title: Purple Nipple
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake well. Strain into shot glass and enjoy!

title: Californian Hurricane
instructions: You can mix in either a punch bowl, or a pitcher. Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together, then add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

title: Dr. Shocker
instructions: Poor Dr. Pepper into glass, add Aftershock. Stir once.

title: Tanyahtoo
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.

title: The Eclipse
instructions: Just shake it well with ice and strain.

title: Pat
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour over ice and stir with a straw.

title: PB&J #2
instructions: Pour the Frangelico 1st. Then add the grenadine.

title: Fuzzy Screw
instructions: Fill glass half with ice, add vodka, peach Schnapps, and then orange juice. Stir.

title: Zimamazing
instructions: Shake the first six ingredients without ice until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker in a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.

title: Carbomb #2
instructions: Combine (proportions of 50/50) Bailiey's Irish Cream and irish wiskey into one shot glass. Drop the shot into a mug of guinness and chugg until empty.

title: Martinet
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker full of ice. Stir or shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: Queen Soda
instructions: Just stir

title: Eyes Wide Shut
instructions: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

title: Candy Bar
instructions: Blend Kahlua, creme de cacao, and Frangelico. Add cream. Serve with ice cubes in highball glass.

title: Cherry Lifesaver Shooter
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

title: Bouzo
instructions: Pour in the bourbon, then pour in the ouzo.

title: Blonde Ron
instructions: Just fill ice, then pour rum, 7up, and slash of pineapple.

title: Double Pucker
instructions: Pour each ounce in same shot glass. Slam or sip and enjoy.

title: Waborita
instructions: In a shaker over ice combine the ingridients, and then pour into a salt rimmed martini glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

title: Irish Monk
instructions: Pour liqueurs into a irish coffe cup. Fill with good quality hot chocolate. Add plenty of whipped cream.

title: Picon Whiskey
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

title: Riley
instructions: Shake first six ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Ass a dash of raspberry syrup. Garnish with a lime squeeze.

title: XYZ
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

title: Saurian Brandy
instructions: Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. -- Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved, then add the maple syrup. -- Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. -- Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average, adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor, without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.

title: Sir Knight
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

title: Lemonade #2
instructions: Pour lemon and lime juice into a pitcher and add sugar. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. Add water and ice cubes. Stir.

title: Mulled Madeira
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in a large saucepan and bring almost to simmer over medium heat. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes (do not simmer). Add Cointreau and stir until hot. Serve warm in heat proof glasses or mugs, leaving peel and spices in pan.

title: Rock and Rye Cooler
instructions: Shake vodka, Rock and Rye, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a ice filled collins glass. Top with lemon soda and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime.

title: Italian Limoncello
instructions: Wash the lemons with a vegetable brush and hot water to remove any reside of pesticides or wax. Carefully zest the lemons with a zester or vegetable peeler so there is no white pith on the peel. -- In a 1-gallon glass jar, add one fifth vodka and the lemon zest. Cover the jar and let sit at room temperature for at least 10 days, and up to 40 days in a cool dark place. -- In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and water and cook until thickened, appx. 5 to 7 minutes. Let the syrup cool before adding it to the limoncello mixture. Add the additional fifth of vodka. Allow to rest for another 10 to 40 days. -- After the rest period, strain and bottle, discarding the lemon zest. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.

title: Lemon Lift
instructions: Serve chilled straight or on the rocks.

title: Sorrento Caf�
instructions: Pour Limoncello and Grand Marinier into coffee cup or glass. Fill with coffee and top with whipped cream.

title: Lemon Highlander
instructions: Pour into scotch glass over ice. Stir. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

title: Pink Cello
instructions: Pour into a tall glass over ice. Fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with wedge of lemon.

title: Lady Cello
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar and Limoncello rimmed highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

title: Cokello
instructions: Pour into tall glass over ice, fill with Coca-Cola and add a wedge of lemon.

title: Bloody Biker
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until well blended. Pour over ice in an old fashion glass.

title: V's With Sauce
instructions: Pour V8 into glass. Add Vodka and stir. Add Worcestershire sauce and stir. Drink!

title: Real Pisser
instructions: In shot glass, pour 1/2 shot of Tequila, then 1/2 shot of Mountain Dew. Next, lick back of hand & sprinkle Sugar lightly onto it. Have Cherry ready on fork, laying on table. Lastly: lick sugar on hand, cover drink & slam on table, drink it fast, & eat cherry.

title: Caucasian
instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes. Add desired amount of Half-and-Half (usually 1 oz. to 3 oz.)

title: Club Tropix
instructions: Fill Hurricane with ice, add malibu and blue curacao, and a splash triple sec. Fill remaining room with equal parts of pineapple juice and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and an umbrella.

title: Bloody Mary Jolly style
instructions: Add together in a glass, and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge, chunk of cheese and an olive.

title: Rainbow Brew
instructions: Pour slowly in the order shown.

title: Kentucky Wildcat
instructions: Mix drink just like a Long Island iced tea. Lemon to garnish

title: Neon Voodoo
instructions: Combine the vodka, apple juice, and mountain dew in a blender with about 6-8 ice cubes. Blend on high for about 10 seconds. Feel free to add more vodka if you want to get messed up really fast.

title: Presidential Margarita
instructions: Pour each ingredent into a large glass. Add ice and let sit while preparing drinking glass. Rim glass with lime and salt. Fill glass with ice and add a lime slice (for looks). Carefully pour contents of large glass into salted glass (careful not to disturb salt).

title: Blue Thrill
instructions: Fill one shot glass with the Blue Curacao. Fill another shot glass with the lemon juice, and serve. To drink, first put lemon shot in mouth, then put curacao shot in mouth, swish around then swallow. Remember, yellow before blue!!

title: Apple Pie Shot #3
instructions: Pour ingredients in order listed into a shot glass.

title: Avocado Daiquiri
instructions: Crush ice in blender. Add rum, lime juice, and 1/4 medium avocado in blender. Blend until thoroughly mixed and smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with lime wedge.

title: Winter Parker
instructions: Add all ingredients in a shaker. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

title: Blue Light Special
instructions: Shake.

title: L�chler
instructions: Southern Comfort, then Lemon, Cola last

title: Bloody Coochie
instructions: Fill glass half full of ice Pour in vodka, triple sec, sour mix, OJ, and fruit punch Stir, or shake

title: Choad
instructions: Pour each ingredient into shot glass. Do not attempt to layer drink, as this is pointless. Mix.

title: Cockroach
instructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass and mix. Sing a verse of La Cucaracha, or sing la-la-la-la-laaa lots. Bonus points if you can sing it in Spanish. Continue until you can no longer sing la-la-la-la-laaaaa.

title: Guillotine
instructions: Very easy. Fill shot glass about 4/5 of the way with Butterscotch schnapps. Float a layer of Bailey's Irish Cream on schnapps. Float a layer of Aftershock on the Bailey's.

title: Reality Twist
instructions: Fill shot glass mostly full of Amaretto, then carefully pour Blue Curacao into the middle of the shot glass to create the blue "twist" down the middle. Looks very cool if done right.

title: Cioccolato e cocco
instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and pour in glass.

title: Roffsing
instructions: Fill half a glass with ice cubes, add Passoa, vodka, lime and pear soft drink. Stir and top with cream. Enjoy!

title: Cinnamon Caramel Apple
instructions: Pour shot of Goldschlager in a cocktail glass, fill with 1/2 glass of chilled apple cider, add 1 shot of caramel liqeuer. Stir to mix.

title: Taste of Winter
instructions: Build in in the glass. Plenty of ice cubes

title: Royal Peaches and Cream
instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend until smooth and no chunks of ice are present. Pour into Mason Jar and garnish with a fresh slice of peach, if desired.

title: Holy Doodle
instructions: Add ingredients, stir, and serve.

title: Creamsicle #3
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice, give it a few good shakes and strain into a cocktail glass with a sugar rim. More potent than the original. Enjoy!

title: Kameleon
instructions: Firstly, build ingredients in the order given in a collins glass over ice. Layer the Pimms on top.

title: Multi-coloured Smurf
instructions: First shake the orange juice, vodka, and Mango Syrup with the ice in a shaker. Float the apricot liquer, and blueberry schnapps in cocktail glass. Then float the shaken vodka and juices.

title: Fl�gel
instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour over a single cube of ice in a small glass. Drink like a shot and throw the ice away!

title: Side Kick
instructions: Shake all ingredients with lot's of ice.

title: Swamp Juice
instructions: In a normal glass, add everclear and then vodka. Nearly fill with orange juice, and then add blue curacao until the entire drink turns a nice shade of green.

title: Negroni - Zimbabwe Style
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Coat rim of glass with sugar. Pour over plenty of ice.

title: John Daly
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add absolute citron and triple sec. Fill glass with half lemonade/half iced tea. Garnish with lemon wedge.

title: Linfield's Spare Part Punch
instructions: Select a large container (at least 5 gallons) that can dispense the drink. Simply mix at will, add the ice on top, and go.

title: Y2K shot
instructions: Chilled glass

title: Southern Harmony
instructions: build over ice and serve with a smile

title: Kumoniwannalaya
instructions: Add all three liquiors together, shake till mixed, then pour into cocktail galss.

title: Maurizio's Dream
instructions: Chop the Lime, stir in with Cane Sugar and Ginger. Add the Crushed Ice and fill up with Apple Juice. Enjoy!

title: Chambrite
instructions: Pour Chambord and vodka into glass. Fill with sprite.

title: Raspberry Truffle
instructions: Add liquers to glass. Fill with milk.

title: Red Eyed Hell
instructions: Mix together and serve.

title: A Goodnight Kiss
instructions: Put one drop of Angostura Bitter on sugar cube and drop in flute. Add champagne and splash of Campari.

title: Coffee Nudge
instructions: Combine all with coffee and top with whipped cream.

title: Yellow Bellied Sap Sucker
instructions: Put in the Lime Juice then add three drops of angostrua bitters. Shake it up, and add the tonic.

title: Jackbull
instructions: Mix all the ingrediants together and serve in the glass with the ice.

title: Doucet devil
instructions: Put amaretto first, then the southern comfort and top this with the creme de banane.

title: Shellshock
instructions: Pour clamato juice over salt, pepper and lemon. Then add beer slowly as it will fizz up.

title: Blue Bohemian
instructions: Shake. Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry.

title: Strawberry Starburst
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps and lemonade. Shake or stir. Garnish with a sugared strawberry if desired.

title: Tom's Rum Runner
instructions: Pour all liquids except dark rum into glass. Fill with ice and stir. Float dark rum on top and stir gently.

title: Absolut Tooch
instructions: Chill with ice and strain into shot glasses.

title: Clousseau
instructions: Mix vodka and kahlua in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

title: Passionate Kiss
instructions: Mix over ice, strain into glass. Garnish with flag.

title: Unicorn
instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake & strain into martini glass or champagne cup. Garnish with red straws & tacky plastic animals (preferably horses or mermaids) Add parasols & slice of orange if available.

title: Dudley's Damnation
instructions: Take a Good size cooler, any with a drain plug will do, and pour in a 12 pack of Zima. Then pour in your 6 liters of sprite along with the 2 cans of limeade. Then pour the 1/2 gallon of vodka in with the rest of it. Stir until the limeade has dissolved totaly, and there you go. Makes roughly 5 gallons.

title: Abe's Tropical Night in Hell
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and stir. Add ice. Then enjoy your night in Hell!

title: Pouce Coupe Puddle
instructions: Pour in order into shot glass.

title: Jealous Queen
instructions: Mix together in glass.

title: Dungeon Punch
instructions: Mix Fruit Punch Flavored Kool-Aid with schnapps, vodka, and orange juice. Once stirred, garnish with cherries.

title: Green Gulf
instructions: Shake with ice. Add creme de mente.

title: Dog Biscuit
instructions: Pour all ingredients on the rocks. Stir.

title: The Postman
instructions: Chill, shake, and pour over ice!

title: Berry Buster
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously for 20 sec. Strain and serve with one fresh ice cube.

title: Keith Jackson
instructions: Mix, Chill, Strain, and Shoot!

title: Captain's Spiced Cider
instructions: Pour (over ice is best, but not necessary) spiced rum into glass, fill with apple cider, stir.

title: Electric Marcucci
instructions: Mix in this order. The blue curacao self-mixing with the Sprite helps for show. Also not so keen in anything other than a clear container of course.

title: Milk Tooth
instructions: Build in a shaker with cubed ice. Pour in Jack Daniels, Creme de Cacao, Blackcurrant and the sweet and sour. Shake well and strain into iced collins glass. Pour over the pineapple juice and then place shaker over glass and shake hard once up and down. Remove shaker and enjoy the froth on top!

title: Soul Taker
instructions: Mix the the parts together and stir briefly.

title: Croc Punch
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors, fill nearly with Sprite and top off with lime juice.

title: Liquid Nitrogen
instructions: Put equal measures of ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir if preferred

title: Pascal
instructions: Pour licor 43 and Midori in a glass and fill with milk and ice

title: Brain Damage
instructions: Pour all the ingredients over an ice-cube and stirr gently

title: Tubboocki
instructions: Just pour and serve.

title: Canteloupe Dizzy
instructions: Pour club soda into a parfait glass with ice. Pour vodka, melon liquer, and peach schnapps into a shaker and shake well. Strain into the club soda and stir. Garnish with cherry/orange/pineapple.

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add the Vodka, then the cider and finaly add the Mountain Dew to taste.

title: Stinky Weasel
instructions: Put Tequila into shot glass. Add 151 rum and Lemon Juice. Add sugar and stir slightly.

title: T-52
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

instructions: Pour Amaretto and margarita mix over ice. Stir well and serve.

instructions: Pour genever add Fernet Branca. Add a dash of sour mix.

title: Gangreen
instructions: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into shot glass.

title: Irish Highball
instructions: Pour whiskey over ice. Fill with ginger ale.

title: Summer Fling
instructions: Layer Blue Curacao and Bailey's in a shot glass over crushed ice. Mix to drink.

title: Green Coconut
instructions: Combine in shaker with ice and pour over ice.

title: Green Eyed Blonde
instructions: Layer carefully in a shot glass.

instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

Finally add the splash of Vodka, and mix a couple more times, then pour over ice.

instructions: Put in highball glass with ice and stir.

instructions: Half fill glass with ice cubes. Add liquor and fill with Mountain Dew.

title: Army Green
instructions: Pour into a shot glass. A chaser may be needed.

instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple, orange slice and maraschino cherry.

title: Red Hurricane
instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Stir.

title: Betty Paige
instructions: Mix the gin and vermouth like you would a normal martini. Pour into cocktail glass and add cherry liqueur. Garnish with cherry.

title: The Big Robowski
instructions: Throw the five shots into a glass, and add the coke or pepsi. Some ice may be necessary.

title: Slammin' Sammy
instructions: Add amaretto and triple sec to ice-filled glass. Pour in orange juice and top off with apple-cranberry juice to taste. Stir.

title: Pink Russian
instructions: Pour liquor in a glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream. Shake.

title: The Colombian
instructions: Layer in a shot glass, or just pour straight into glass.

title: Nagel Nectar
instructions: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in glass of ice.

title: Alpine Sprite
instructions: Pour and stir. Add ice if desired.

instructions: Add rum and Mountain Dew to glass. Then add enough Maui to make the drink bright green.

instructions: Fill glass half full of ice. Add Schnapps and Juice. Add the Cream and stir.

instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour blue curacao and vodka into glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with 1/2 cranberry juice and 1/2 grape juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with coke. Add a splash of pineapple at the top and then shake thourghly.

instructions: Mix vodka and blue curacao with crushed ice, shake or stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with orange slice and cherries.

title: Meiner
instructions: Pour gin and fill with orange juice, leaving room for the Campari. Stir a little bit. Add a slice of orange, then pour the Campari gently on the slice.

instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add Sprite and top with lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

title: Chambord Kamikaze
instructions: Muddle lime in a shaker. Add ice and all other ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain into a glass.

title: Vesper #2
instructions: Pour Gin, Vodka, and Vermouth over crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake gently until ice cold. Strain mixture over a martini glass. Run outside of lemon twist around the inside of the martini glass.

instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add Absolut Mandarin, then fill with Orange Crush or some other orange soda.

title: Sabra
instructions: Chill together in the shaker and strain into a shot glass.

title: Scotch Toddy
instructions: In a standard coffee mug put the scotch, honey and tea bag. Pour boiling hot water to fill mug. Steep for about one or two minutes. Then remove and dispose of tea bag.

title: Irish Cream, Home Made #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until well stirred. Great in your favorite drink recipes or straight as a dessert. Drink contents within two weeks. Some ingredients are perishable. Store in an airtight container so you can shake it before each use. The chocolate settles at the bottom.

title: Flying Teetsie Fly
instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.

title: Flying Squirrel
instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with crushed ice. Pour tequila and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix and lime juice. Fill the rest with orange juice.

title: Half & Half
instructions: Fill a pint glass half full with Harp. Slowly fill the remainder of the glass with Guiness, pouring slowly over the back side of a spoon. It should layer nicely.

title: Slippery Eggs
instructions: Stir ingrediants well so the drink is the original color of the eggnog.

title: Liquid Rocher
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cordial glass. Enjoy.

title: Strawberry Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until drink is smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

title: Florida Pina Colada
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Mojambo Punch

title: Brian Sinnott Family Punch - Leaded

title: Vaughn Purple Haze
