title: Brian Sinnott Family Punch - Unleaded
instructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonaid, sugar, and water. Add ice cubes and let cool. Add ginger ale before serving.

title: Dirk Diggler
instructions: Add J�germeister, and fill rest of glass with Thomas Kemper Root beer. Mix and enjoy!

title: Conga Line
instructions: Shake.

title: Hakkespett
instructions: Layer Cointreau and Chartreuse in the glass. Ignite with a match, lick the palm of your hand and cover the glass with it. Shake it a little bit after the glass has fastened itself. Remove your hand slowly while inhaling the air inside, shot the entire contents, put two fingers in your mouth, inhale sharply and deeply, and then try to say: "Hakkespett!" (In English: "Woodpecker!") Good luck!

title: Orange Bomb
instructions: Shake. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles.

title: La Cafe
instructions: Blend. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

title: Czech Collaborator
instructions: Mix both liquors well, and pour into a shot glass.

title: Strawberry Blonde
instructions: Stir gently with a swizzle stick before serving.

title: Chill Out Shock (C.O.S)
instructions: First pour the chilled schnapps and than carefully layer the hot espresso on top of it. Insert a straw into the glass and place it on the connection point between the two layers and drink it from there.

title: Red Melon
instructions: Ppour vodka, melon and peach schnapps over ice. Top with the sprite, stir well, add 1 dash of the grenadine and serve. Garnish with a slice of lemon (or lime), or a piece of melon.

title: Sweet Solution
instructions: Fill a tall glass or cup with ice cubes, about 1/3 of the way full. Add the shots of tequila, adding more or less depending on the size of the cup. Then fill up most of the cup with raspberry lemonade, and add the frozen orange juice concentrate. Mix it well with a spoon until everything is well blended.

title: Rip Griffin
instructions: Put ice in glass, add peppermint schapps, fill with orange juice, stir, add cherry.

title: Whistling Gypsy
instructions: Layer Tia Maria, Bailey's Irish Cream, Vodka (Stolichnaya) in that order in a doubleshot glass(3oz).

title: Baltic Murder Mystery

title: Tequila Twilight
instructions: Fill the glass 1/3 full of tequila and then the rest with the cranberry juice, leaving enough room for the shot of grape juice.

title: Sweet Surrender

title: Jack Voigt
instructions: Put in any order in shot glass, preferably Captain first.

title: Patat�s
instructions: Blend Amaretto, Rum and Curacao then pour in a glass with ice. Add orange juice, then splash with grenadine.

title: Beakers Blue
instructions: Add ice cubes, stir, and garnish with cheery.

title: Duke's Nightmare
instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into shot glasses. The colder the shot the smoother it goes down. A dash of 7-up or sprite may be added to extend the shot for more than three.

title: Lemonade Lush
instructions: Mix ingredients in a glass filled with ice and enjoy.

title: Irish Cup O' Joe
instructions: Pour Baileys and chocolate syrup in coffee mug. Fill with hot coffee, stir and enjoy.

title: Hyper-Active Apple
instructions: In Irish coffee mug pour chilled caramel, then slowly pour one shot of chilled apple shnapps over caramel. Slowly add steamed milk, pour espresso through steamed milk exceedingly slowly, top with whip cream or foam. It should come out to be a 4 layer happily alcoholic Latte.

title: Creamy Crispy Crunch
instructions: Shake with ice (drink should be a bit foamy). Pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

title: Green Beaver
instructions: layer in a shotglass.

title: Cinco de Rob-o
instructions: Start with a pint glass filled 3/4 with ice. Add the tequila, triple sec, and sweet and sour. The glass should be about 1/2 full. Add the ginger ale, and stir well.

title: Fox Poison

title: Black Rose Bacardi
instructions: Shake or stir, pour it into a cocktail glass, add some crushed ice and serve.

title: Cran-Razz
instructions: Place ice cubes in glass. Add cranberry juice, then orange vodka.

title: Passoa Sweet Dreams
instructions: Shake.

title: Irish Griep
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add blue curacao and sour mix. Top off with cola. Stir until a greenish/blue mixture is obtained.

title: Chocolate Valentine
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

title: Mussolini
instructions: Mix and pour into shot glass(es).

title: Captain Climer
instructions: Stir well.
Add each ingredient one by one to shot glass, and enjoy!

title: Raspberry Trouffle
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, add Amaretto, and balance with Cream. Shake. Serve with Straw. Garnish with Cherry

title: Flyin' Hawaiian
instructions: Pour Midori, rum, and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in Sprite and stir lightly.

title: Southern Frost
instructions: Mix together over ice.

title: Seattle Smog
instructions: Pour shots into mason jar filled with ice. Fill 2/3 of remaining with cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Stir.

title: Irish Cactus
instructions: Pour Irish Cream and Tequila over ice and stir.

title: Hawaiian Volcano
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

title: Nicolalas
instructions: Mix Absolut Mandrin with Passoa in a highball glass. Put ice in the glass and fill it up with orange juice

title: Mexican Cherry
instructions: Pour into a shot glass.

title: The Graduate
instructions: Shake over ice, strain.

title: Winter Breeze
instructions: Pour the three shots of liquor, Vanilla Schnapps, Creme de Cacao, and Irish Creme, into the mug. Fill the rest of the glass with milk. Stir the milk and liquors in the glass and serve.

title: Nolan
instructions: Add the three ingredients, and mix gently.

title: Ash Blonde
instructions: Shake lillet and cointreau with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Add splash of vermouth for color.

title: Santa Fe
instructions: In a highball or tall glass full of ice, pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec, and garnish with a lime wedge.

title: Rum Runner #2
instructions: Freeze in blender and serve in 12 Oz. glass.

title: Watercolour
instructions: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice. Garnish with a cherry or a chunk of pineapple.

title: Captain Morgan's Steamy Applecolada Dream
instructions: Start with hot or steamed apple cider. Add equal parts apple schnapps, spiced rum and coconut rum. Stir.

title: Mean Green Machine
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into glass.

title: The Original Margarita
instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish: lime or lemon slice

title: Black Cactus
instructions: Pour Tequila and blackberry brandy together. Add club soda. Drink like a shooter.

title: Black Wolf
instructions: Add chartreuse first and then sambuca. Top with tabasco.

title: Jack Rose
instructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain.

title: Nalgaa

title: Sunshine Smile

title: Junior Mint
instructions: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, and strain into old fashioned glass.

title: Cinnamon Cream
instructions: Stir.

title: Lemon Celebration

title: Rugburn

title: Rod on the Rocks

title: Golden Delicious
instructions: Pour sparkling apple cider into a glass. Pour the shot of Goldschlager. Stir.

title: Jagerbeer Bomb

title: Mike's Chocolate Pudding

title: Rythym & Blues
instructions: Mix in a shot glass.

title: Creeping Death
instructions: Shake well.

title: Frisky Witch

title: Midori Jello Shots

Meanwhile, bring 1 cup of water to a rolling boil then stir in the Jello and Gelatin until dissolved. Stir in hot Midori. Pour mixture into a flat bottom pan and slice into cubes when cooled, or place in small cups.

instructions: Stir.

instructions: Pour over ice, stir.

instructions: Shake it, pour it over ice, and serve.

instructions: Serve chilled.

instructions: Shakem up and serve

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

instructions: Blend.

instructions: Stir.

Place mixture into aging container. Add lemon peels and alcohol, stirring to combine. Cover container and put in a cool, dark place (or refrigerate if necessary). Stand for 1 week, stirring occasionally. Strain and filter: press out liquid from peaches with the back of a wooden spoon. Strain again. Ready for cooking now, ready for drinking in another month.

instructions: Stir.

instructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and fill with tonic. Add some ice cubes and garnish with orange peels.

title: Imperial Moka
instructions: Shake

title: Midori Green Russian
instructions: Pour over ice.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain. Garnish with a slice of orange. Ice is optional.

instructions: Pour Midori and sweet&sour. Add champagne.

instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange spiral.

instructions: Layer in order.

instructions: Mix and shoot straight away.

instructions: Build over ice in glass. Garnish with 3 cherries.

title: Dirty Mop
instructions: Shake with ice.

instructions: Blend.

instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Could be garnished with a piece of pineapple.

instructions: Serve over ice.

instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a shaker. Shake 3-4 times. Pour into glass and garnish (optional) with a Lemon wedge.

instructions: Freeze a martini glass and it in shaved chocolate to rim. In a shaker put ice, Stoli vanilla, Stoli vodka, and white creme de cacao. Shake lightly and pour into martini glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss.

title: Bermuda Triangle
instructions: Add ingredients over ice, stir gently and garnish with a fresh orange slice.

title: Island Tide
instructions: Add all ingredients into a Collins Glass and stir. Ice is optional. Also add 3 mandarin orange slices, and 2 peach slices to the drink. Sink them to the bottom. You may also garnish the glass with a lemon slice, peach slice or mandarin orange slice.

title: Fruity Pebble
instructions: Shake with ice. Makes a dope shooter or pour over rocks.

title: Fuzzy Pusser
instructions: Mix together in a pitcher. Pour into hurricane glass.

title: Godiva Chocolate Martini
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice, shake and pour into chilled cocktail glass.

title: Georgia Pie
instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

title: Flying Moose
instructions: Poor liquors into the highball glass, balance with sprite and top with grenadine.

title: Red Mosquito
instructions: Combine vodka and hot damn in shot glass, stir and shoot.

title: Italian Sunrise #2
instructions: Blend until slushy, pour & enjoy!

title: Mean Green Love Making Machine
instructions: Put ingredients in shaker, shake, pour over ice.

title: Mountain Sunrise
instructions: Shake. Serve over crushed ice.

title: Vodka Sunrise
instructions: Mix Vodka, orange juice, then top with grenadine

title: Cranberry Sunrise
instructions: Mix Vodka, then cranberry juice, then orange juice, then top with grenadine

title: Bayou Backwater
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort and lemonade into a 12 oz glass. Stir. Add ice if desired.

title: Mandarin Metropolitan
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of mandarin orange on the side.

title: Deep South
instructions: Mix pineapple juice and molasses well, either shake or blend, stirring won't work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. Serve slightly cooler than room temp, or over ice.

title: Mandarin Split
instructions: Shake once.

title: Bull Rider
instructions: Mix all ingredients well and enjoy!

title: Groader
instructions: Mix ingredients in order.

title: Midori 2000
instructions: Build over ice and garnish with Pineapple wedge, 3 Pineapple leaves, 2 Cherries

title: Heartbreaker's Special
instructions: Pour vodka into a blender. Add passoa, orange juice and pineapple juice. Add crushed ice and flesh of an orange. Blend well.

title: Almond Joy Dark
instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Fill with pineapple. Add grenadine to color. Shake. Garnish with pineapple flag.

title: Wynonna's Strawberry Delight
instructions: Stir with a straw.

title: Knoxville Lemonade
instructions: Fill mason jar 3/4 full of large ice cubes. Add peach schnapps and vodka. Add lemonade and ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of orange and two straws.

title: Peach May Cocktail
instructions: All mixed together. No special ways to mix.

title: Pink Cotton Candy
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and stir.

title: California Iced Tea
instructions: Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.

title: Mexican stand-off
instructions: Layer in the above order.

title: Blue Skies
instructions: Simply follow the order above, pouring directly into the glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the glass.

title: Midnight Flight to Malibu
instructions: Build with ice. Can be shaken, or left layered.

title: Sweet Satisfaction
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice and combine ingredients, stir and enjoy.

title: Deep Valley
instructions: Starting by the gin and the blue curacao and finishing by the soda, mix directly into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a long lemon twist, a cherry and mint leaves.

title: The Game
instructions: Fill highball with ice, add rum and fill with cranberry, top off with triple sec.

title: Shrewsbury Slammer
instructions: Stir each ingredient in a mixing tin, then strain into a shot glass.

title: Summer Sky
instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add gin and triple sec, and fill with pineapple juice. Add a splash of grenadine on top.

title: Green Poison
instructions: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.

title: Pink Millenium
instructions: Mix vodka, cranberry juice and sugar syrup. Pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

title: Absolut 600
instructions: Chop the peach and put into a blender. Blend together with the frozen orangejuice and a few raspberries. Add a few drops grenadine, the limejuice and the vanilla syrup. Blend until it's smooth. Pour the absolut mandarin into a highball glass. Fill the glass to half with the mix from the blender and fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine. Stir and serve.

title: Raspberry Release
instructions: Pour ingredients in snifter and stir.

title: Kick yer Ass Sas
instructions: Pour shots and soda over ice in mason jar or antique glass and experience a taste of the old west.

title: Blue Lady
instructions: Half fill martini glass with crushed ice, pour in alcohol and stir.

title: Hurricane #2
instructions: Pour gin, rum(s), amaretto, and triple sec into a tall hurricane-style glass with ice. Add equal amounts of grapefruit juice and pineapple juice until almost full. Top with grenadine to taste.

title: White Tornado
instructions: The trick to getting the look of the Tornado is to pour the Tequila Rose slowly on the side of the shooter glass on top of the Sambuca.

title: Bootzilla
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

title: Fuzzy Watermelon
instructions: Cut a hole into one end of the watermelon and pour the peach schnapps into it. Put the watermelon into the refrigerator for at least 6 hours. -- Or cut the watermelon into small pieces and place them into a dish. Pour the peach schnapps over the watermelon evenly and refrigerate for a few hours.

title: Dressed Up Pina Colada
instructions: Make a zig-zag pattern of chocolate syrup on the inside of the glass while turning the glass. Blend rum, coconut milk and pineapple, with 2 cups of crushed ice, on high for a few seconds, until all large chunks of ice are gone. Pour into glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

title: My Wasted Generation
instructions: Shake with ice.

title: Buzzby
instructions: Put all ingrediants in highball with ice, and stir. Lime garnish optional.

title: Zadarade
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add Absolut Mandrin, triple sec, and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and pineapple. Shake, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

title: Red Rattlesnake
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice. Shake.

title: Vodka Passion
instructions: Mix both liquids over ice and strain into shot glass.

title: Tropic Heat
instructions: Mix over ice and shake. Pour into a glass, garnish with fruit.

title: Rusty Screw
instructions: Combine Scotch and Grand Marnier in snifter. Twist lemon peel into mixture. Sip and enjoy.

title: Greek Sex On The Beach
instructions: Put all ingredients in together, and shake. Serve in a glass filled up to 2/3 with ice.

title: Crowbar
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain over ice.

title: ATP
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass, then add the amaretto. Stir.

title: Cloud 9
instructions: Mix all ingredients except whipped cream in a blener untill ice is well chopped. Pour in coffee mug and top with generous portion of whipped cream.

title: Cubano
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, pour in ingredients, shake well and pour.

title: Italian Margarita
instructions: Pour into glass. Stir. Add ice cubes.

title: Tropical Titty Twister
instructions: Mix in glass then shake.

title: The Reservoir Dog
instructions: Mix J�germeister and Irish cream over ice cubes and strain. Pour into cordial glass and serve.

title: Midori Sun
instructions: Shake well with ice and stir up! Garnish with a lime/cherry and a orange.

title: Swedish pinkie
instructions: Put everything in a mixer and mix thoroughly. Pour into a champagne coupe.

title: Chiquita
instructions: Put lots of ice in your shaker. Then pour first the vodka, then the "creme" and last the milk over the ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glasses. Makes several shots.

title: The Rising Skirt
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Pour in a sour glass with ice and top with an orange slice.

title: Mandarin Sunrise
instructions: Mix Absolut Mandarin, peach schnapps, pineapple & orange juice in a shaker with ice. Pour into collins glass fill with 7-up and stir. Add grenadine so that it sinks to bottom and garnish with a twist of lime.

title: Safe Sex on the Beach
instructions: Pour over ice in a chilled glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

title: Black Feather
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an Orange Twist.

title: Orange 43
instructions: Pour over ice and stir to mix.

title: Leprechaun
instructions: Pour whiskey over ice in a chilled glass. Top with tonic water and stir gently. Drop in lemon twist.

title: Spanish Coffee
instructions: Pour Licor 43 and coffee into a irish coffee cup. Float whipped cream and sprinkle a little cinnamon on top.

title: Jeannie's Dream
instructions: In a hurricane glass (or a long drink glass), pour orange juice, pineapple juice and 7-Up. Add Malibu rum and stir gently. Slowly add as a top off the sloe gin, so the red color slowly mixes down through the rest of the drink.

title: Dancing Leprechaun
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass with ice cubes. Add a twist of lemon.

title: Akis Special
instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with Sprite and stir.

title: Coco Cabana
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

title: Batida de Coco
instructions: Blend well and add crushed ice.

title: Red Hope
instructions: Blend. Pour into collins glass half filled with crushed ice.

title: Petite Fleur
instructions: Shake and strain.

title: Whisky Melba
instructions: Muddle a small pice of fresh ginger in the glass. Fill glass with ice, add whisky and ginger ale. Drop in a strip of lemon peel and stir gently.

title: Call of the Snowfields (Lumikenttien Kutsu)
instructions: Blend with ice and pour into cocktail glass. Sprinkle grated nutmeg on top.

title: Finlandia Coffee
instructions: Pour vodka and Lapponia Lakka into an irish coffee cup. Fill with hot coffee and float fresh cream or whipped cream on top.

title: Royal Temptation
instructions: Blend. Serve in cocktail glass rimmed with white and brown chocolate flakes.

title: Violetta
instructions: Shake. Garnish with a slice of orange, fresh mint leaves and a cherry. Serve with straws.

title: Festrus
instructions: Stir in mixing glass. Pour into cocktail glass and add a squeeze of orange peel.

title: Green Hope
instructions: Shake with ice. Garnish with red and red cherries.

title: Magic Star
instructions: Shake. Garnish with powdered chocolate and a star made of crystalized fruit.

title: Rheingold
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass. Add a twist of orange.

title: Ramcooler
instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a 10 oz glass, fill with crushed ice and shake. Garnish with a red cherry and a slice of lime.

title: Juicy Guiness Premier
instructions: Mix in the shots of Blue Curacao, Taboo and Vodka. Then add the Guiness to the spirits up to 3cm below the rim of the pint glass. Allow the Guiness to settle before adding the Carling Premier. Allow to settle again before consuming.

title: Flaming Lemon Drop
instructions: Pour Absolut Citron into shot glass and top off with a splash of Galliano. Place one half lemon slice flat on the rim of the shot glass, put some sugar on the slice and soak the sugar with 151 proof rum. -- Just before drinking, ignite the sugar. Blow the flame out when the it seems to caramelize the sugar. Lick the sugar off the lemon slice, down the vodka mixture, then either suck the juices or bite the pulp of the lemon.

title: Gr�ngeist
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour in a hurricane glass that has been frosted with sugar. Add a twist of lemon.

title: Buttsex

ingredients.amount: 2 oz strong and black  or espresso
ingredients.name: Coffee

instructions: Start with the coffee, preferably espresso. Add in the vodka, triple sec and lemon juice (lime juice can be used instead) and stir. Top with the whipped cream.

title: Jumanji
instructions: Mix all liqueurs and juice in shaker, add ice and shake well. Pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish with fresh fruit.

title: Bruja Mexicana
instructions: Mix strega and tequila in a blender the crushed ice. Moist the rim of the glass with lemon and decorate with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup. Pour in and fill with soda.

title: Sir Francis
instructions: First, pour all 3 vodkas over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with grenadine, shake & serve.

title: Sex with the bartender
instructions: Mix rum, triple sec, lime juice, grenadine and 7-up. Garnish with lemon and lime, then splash irish cream down the middle.

title: Emerald Eye
instructions: Add each ingredient to the shot glass. Color should be a bright emerald green.

title: Undertow
instructions: Pour schnapps, then curacao into the glass. Do not mix.

title: Curious Comfort
instructions: Add Blue Curacao, Southern Comfort, and half of the pineapple juice over ice and shake. Add remainder of pineapple juice to taste.

title: Iced Velvet
instructions: Fill Highball glass with ice. Pour 1 oz. Black Velvet Canadian Whisky over ice. Fill up glass with Iced Tea. Stir with a straw.

title: Champagne Martini
instructions: Mix and serve.

title: Blindside
instructions: In a large glass pour strawberry syrup, orange juice, and grapefruit juice, finally, add vodka.

title: Raggae Sunsplash
instructions: Pour gin and pineapple juice in a shaker and shake well. Pour into the glass over ice. Add the strawberry syrup. Use a straw to add a little bit of the food coloring in the froth.

title: Resaca Water
instructions: Place the vodka, rum and watermelon liqueur with ice in a shaker. Add the pineapple and orange juice and shake. Pour in a hurricane glass with ice in it. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

title: The Crown Cherry
instructions: Mix all together in glass with ice.

title: CA area 151
instructions: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.

title: Ball and Chain
instructions: In shot glass, mix 1 part Gold with 1 part Rump, add a splash of Jager over the top. Manly shot with a tasty surprise.

title: Ski Shooter
instructions: Put ice in a shaker, then the vodka, followed by the amaretto and the sweet and sour. Cover and shake like crazy. Pour into shot glasses.

title: Skipper's Ripper
instructions: Add rum, whiskey, and grenadine to glass. Fill the rest of the way with Coke. Stir once to mix.

title: Jamaican Bum
instructions: Pour shots into glass over ice, fill with 7-up, add cream and stir. Garnish with any fruit or cherry.

title: San Patricio
instructions: Fill mug 3/4 full with coffee. Add Kahlua, Bailey's and cream. Stir and serve.

title: Breast Milk
instructions: Mix all ingredients in tin with crushed ice. Shake, strain, and serve.

title: Tie Me To The Bedpost (Hawaiian)
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an over-sized martini glass. There should be a slight amount of foam from the 7-up.

title: Cina Polada
instructions: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and banana slice.

title: Blue Screw
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour Mandrin and Blue in, then fill it with OJ. Simple.

title: California Rattle Snake
instructions: Mix equal parts of Southern Comfort, Malibu Rum, an Amerretto in a mixing tin over ice. Add a splash or sour mix, grenadine, and 7-up. Shake well. Can be served over ice or as a shot.

title: Spritsor
instructions: Add ice, then whisky, fill with soda. Stir and enjoy.

title: Gorilla Milk #2
instructions: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

title: C*m Shot (B-Street Bar)
instructions: Sprinkle grains of salt in bottom of shot glass. Pour equal parts of peach schnapps and irish cream. Top with whipped cream. Drink is to be consumed with "no hands" (glass picked up with the mouth and slammed back in one "swallow.") Creamy with just a hint of salt to cut the sweetness.

title: Temptress
instructions: Toss some ice cubes into a glass. Pour in a shot of grenadine and a shot of vodka. Fill with gingerale or Sprite and enjoy.

title: Bullvodka
instructions: Pour 2 shots of Vodka in glass. Fill with cold Red Bull. Add 2 ice cubes (optional).

title: Blue Diamond
instructions: Pour 3/4 shots of each into old fashioned glass.

title: Jack & Ginger
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Jack Daniels then add ginger ale. Stir.

title: Jacobs Haze
instructions: Mix vodka, J�germeister and Red Bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

title: Georgia Peach #2
instructions: In a 10 oz highball filled with ice, add Southern Comfort, peach schnapps and fill with orange juice. Mix. Top with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with cherry and serve.

title: Martina Mandarina
instructions: Pour juice, vodka and a splash of Grand Marnier in a shaker. Add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange curl.

title: Cinn's Stop Light
instructions: Layer each ingredient on top of each other. Melon first, then grenadine, then baileys. Use back of tablespoon to layer evenly.

title: Beer Breezer
instructions: Add freezer chilled vodka to frosted glass, add tabasco and celery salt, top up with very cold very strong lager.

title: Nappy Dugout
instructions: Build over 2 cubes of ice. Stir.

title: Murray's Cocktail
instructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Pour rum, vodka, and citron vodka into glass. Fill with 7-up. Mix.

title: Battering Ram
instructions: Mix vodka and tequila in a highball glass, fill up with ice cold Battery and add a dash of lime. Stir and serve.

title: Mocha Frappe
instructions: Pour chilled coffe, milk, and instant chocolate milk powder into blender. Mix together. Add Whipped cream and Ice Cream, and Blend together at 'Frappe' setting. Pour into mug.

title: Parrot Perch
instructions: Put liquor, juice, and syrup in blender. Add the sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth.

title: Raging Bull #2
instructions: Fill a highball glass half full with ice cubes. Add vodka and tequila, fill up with Red Bull. Add a dash of lime juice.

title: Avocado Milkshake
instructions: Blend on medium for 3 to 5 minutes.

title: Golden Sip
instructions: Pour over lots of ice.

title: Forgive Me
instructions: Stir with ice and strain to cocktail glass.

title: Grandma's Swingin' Eggnog
instructions: Beat yolks until light. Add sugar and mix well. Add milk and rum. Mix well, then chill for at least 3 hours. One hour before serving, whip cream and stir into chilled mixture. Return to refrigerator for an hour. Serve in punch cups and dust with nutmeg. Serves 20.

title: Naughty Angel
instructions: Stir.

title: Colorado Rattlesnake
instructions: Pour chilled Tequila in shot glass and put to the side. Pour Tomato Juice in a second shot glass and dash pepper and Tabasco in the Tomato Juice. Shoot Tequila and chase with tomato juice shot.

title: Fall of Rome
instructions: pour vermouth and brandy into glass, add lime and fill with orange juice, and stir. Splash brandy on top, and serve with straw.

title: Cubano Coffee
instructions: Warm up rum, creme cacao, sugar and coffee. Float the double fresh cream floating on top. Optionally sprinkle some grated chocolate on top of the cream.

title: Jumper Cable
instructions: Pour rum over ice, fill with Jolt, and stir.

title: Emerald City
instructions: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

title: Banana JABS
instructions: Pour Banana Liqueur into a Highball glass over ice. Add Malibu Rum and top with Mountain Dew.

title: Sour Mix
instructions: Dissolve sugar in water and add lemon juice. Refrigerate. Optionally you can add a little egg white (will make drinks foamy).

title: Forest Funk
instructions: Moisten the rim of the Collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

title: Aztec Gold
instructions: Ice a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigourously for 12- 15 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel on the rim.

title: Thorny Mexican
instructions: Add Tequila Rose and follow with tequila.

title: Key West Lemonade
instructions: Mix vodka and sweet and sour proportionally in any size batch, then add sprite or 7-up and cranberry accordingly, a dash each per serving. Directions are for single, regular bar size serving.

title: Charlie's Angel
instructions: Half fill glass with ice. Pour all ingredients into the beaker of a cocktail shaker apart from the soda. Mix gently. Pour into glass. Take one fresh lime wedge, squeeze and drop in. Add soda to top. Serve with stirrer and straw.

title: Creamy Comfort
instructions: Pour over ice.

title: Cat's Eye
instructions: Shake gin, chartreuse, and vermouth in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist orange peel and drop into cocktail.

title: Chumbawumba
instructions: Pour a basic snake bite of half cider and lager in a pint glass. Then add to the top a shot of whiskey and vodka. Stir and then drink.

title: Mind Eraser #2
instructions: Place ice cubes in a small, narrow glass. Add the Kahlua, then the vodka and finally the Sprite.

title: Chocolate Cake #2
instructions: Pour 3/4 oz of vodka and 1/4 oz frangelico into a shot glass. Cover the slice of lime with powdered sugar. Bite on the lime with powdered sugar on it and hold the juice in your mouth. Then take the shot while the lime juice is still in your mouth. You now have a chocolate cake shot.

title: Shakes "Party To Go"
instructions: Drink the first 6oz of a Fresh Samantha and then discretely add the triple sec and vodka. Then shake baby!

title: Lumberjack
instructions: Pour into shot glass, no particular order. Add small dash of hot sauce.

title: Cosmoquila
instructions: Shake all ingrediants with ice and strain.

title: Casa Noble Margarita
instructions: Pour all ingrediants over ice and stir.

title: Applejack (Jack Daniel's original recipe)
instructions: Mix in glass on the rocks.

title: The Fuzzy Magnum
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass and squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

title: J's Tropical Orgasm (JTO)
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice. Coat the rim of the glass with sugar, strain shaker contents over ice and add the cherry.

title: Cloudberry Dream
instructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir and garnish with cranberries.

title: Black Cow #2
instructions: Pour over ice. Stir lightly. Tastes like the treat known as a Black Cow, which is vanilla ice cream and root beer.

title: Hawaiian Punch
instructions: Pour over ice, (grenadine last), and stir.

title: Bloody Shame
instructions: Pour V8 into glass, add Tabasco and stir with celery stalk. Sprinkle on salt and pepper. Enjoy.

title: Neopolitan martini
instructions: In a mixing glass with ice, pour stoli vanil, stoli oranj, grand marnier, parfait d'amour and lime juice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel

title: Blue Cosmopolitan
instructions: Frost the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Stir absolut citron, blue curacao, grapefruit juice, and sugar syrup in a mixing glass with ice to prevent cloudiness. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

title: Stiletto Manhattan
instructions: Add 1/2 oz dry vermouth in a chilled cocktail glass, and roll the vermouth around the glass and throw away the excess. In a mixing glass with ice, pour crown royal, amaretto, and orange bitters and stir. Strain into cocktail glass, and garnish with orange peel and maraschino cherry.

title: Absinthe Minded Martini
instructions: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice, pour gin and absinthe, and stir. In your cocktail glass, roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

title: Diablo
instructions: Put ice in glass, pour Casa Noble Reposado Tequila, Creme de cassis, fresh lime juice and fill with ginger ale, stir. Pud wedge of lime on top.

title: Tequilini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.

title: Acid Rain
instructions: Drink about a third of the bottle of Snapple Rain, and then fill it back up with bacardi. Put the cap back on and shake it up.

title: Black Cow #3
instructions: Pour Coke into glass of milk

title: Jon Lee Hooker
instructions: Mix liquor and syrup with some ice, add 7-up and enjoy.

title: Long Island Milkshake
instructions: In a large blender cup, add ice, sugar cubes, creme de cacao, vanilla extract (optional), and the cream or Half & Half. Mix for no more than 5-10 seconds. Then add the alcoholic beverages in no particular order, then hit the "frappe" or "whip" button on the blender for 15-20 seconds, or until you can see that all the ingredients are well-blended, but before you over-blend and start the ice melting too fast. Serve in a tall pre-chilled Tom Collins or similar tall iced-tea glass. No garnish required, serve with a large-diameter straw.

title: Mamacita
instructions: In a hurricane glass with ice add malibu rum, passoa, and cointreau. Fill the balance with guava syrup and shake well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple.

title: Grinch #2
instructions: Fill the glass with ice and put the first 4 acohols in, the put the sweet and sour and 7-up a little more 7-up than Sweet and Sour. Then float the Blue on top. If done right it should go from green to yellow to blue.

title: Cocoa Chanel
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

title: Monet Carribean Frost
instructions: Fill snifter with ice, add rums and vanilla. Then splash with cola and then fill rest of glass with orange juice. Pour mixture in blender and half blend so it isn't too thick. Pour back into brandy snifter and serve.

title: Creative Native
instructions: Add all liquid ingredients in blender and set on frappe till the drink is the consistancy of a smoothie. You can serve this in a frosty hurricane glass and top off with whipped cream as desired.

title: Chicks Dig It
instructions: Pour over ice filled glass shake enjoy! the chicks will dig it. can also be served up in a martini glass

title: Gorilla Smile
instructions: Combine all in a blender with a 8-12 oz of ice, blend. Barnish with a banana slice speared through an umbrella.

title: Royal Laundry
instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker of ice. Let sit till icy cold. Serve in a martini glass.

title: Chuck Wagon
instructions: Pour jager into shot glass, add drops of tabasco and slam.

title: Hot Georgia Peach
instructions: Chill and pour in shot glass. Serve.

title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka then all other ingredients. Stir.

title: Viking Blood
instructions: Pour Aquavit and Tia Maria over ice, fill with Sprite/7-Up and stir.

title: Coffee Crisp
instructions: Add four ingredients and shake well, pour into old-fashioned glass. Do not use ice.

title: Grinch
instructions: Mix ingredents pour over ice chill, shake, strain and serve.

title: Scrumdriver
instructions: Mix the vodka and orange juice in a chilled highball glass over ice. Add several dashes of lime juice at your discretion.

title: Candy Corn
instructions: Carefully layer on top of each other to resemble the halloween candy. First the Licor 43, then the orange curacao, then finally the cream.

title: Candy Corn #2
instructions: Start with the vodka, 100 proof is important, then sweet and sour, etc. right in order. It naturally sets up a base for the grenadine to float through. The grenadine dash should top off the shot glass and filter down, leaving no grenadine on top. Tapping the shot while steadying the top of the glass helps this.

title: Charlie's Angel #2
instructions: Pour the white creme de menth in the highball glass and fill with the double cream to an inch from the top and stir well. Next carefully float the spiced rum on the top. Drink from the bottom with a straw.

title: White Rabbit
instructions: Fill the glass with ice, add in the vodka, vanilla liqueur, and milk shake and surve.

title: Purple Nasty
instructions: Add the blackcurrant squash undiluted into the pint glass, usually 1-2 cm up the glass will do depending on how blackcurrenty you want it. Then fill up to the 2/3 rds mark with cider, finishing off with larger.

title: Four Roses Cocktail
instructions: Shake well in cracked ice, strain into cocktail glasses, serve with twist of lemon peel. Serves four.

title: St. Clement's
instructions: Put the two ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice, and serve in a highball glass over whole ice cubes with a twist of lemon and a twist of orange.

title: Ahhhhhh....
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a glass, sit back and enjoy.

title: Irish Cream BTB
instructions: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly, except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recomended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream, mix lightly, do not overmix.

title: Mind Eraser #3
instructions: Fill cup with ice, layer each ingredient starting with Kalhua, then Vodka, then butterscotch schnapps, then 7-up.

title: Jack Rogers
instructions: Pour Jack Daniels over ice in a tall (collins) glass. Fill with coke. Lace with grenadine to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional).

title: White Russian #3
instructions: Pour pour vanilla vodka and kalhua over ice. Top off with light cream and enjoy.

title: Coffee Crisp Shot
instructions: Pour first three in order, layer Bailey's on top.

title: Fidel Castro
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add the rum and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale.

title: Fuzzy Logic
instructions: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice, shake and pour.

title: Ski Slope
instructions: Mix in any order, serve in glass with ice.

title: K-Dawg's Apple Pie
instructions: In a cup, pour in the Amaretto. Then add the tablespoon of Cinnamon Schnapps. Fill cup with Apple Juice and stir. Served warm.

title: Southern Pride
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into shot glass, then put in the Peach Schnapps. Bottoms up!

title: Silverado
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

title: Tiger's Milk
instructions: Shake ingredients in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain ingredients into an old-fashioned glass of ice.

title: Buzzard's Breath
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a shot glass.

title: D.P.R.
instructions: Fill collins or tall glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.

title: Massacre
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass of ice. Stir well and serve.

title: General Lee
instructions: Combine the lime juice, club soda, and sugar into a collins glass. Stir, then add ice cubes, Anisette, and gin. Stir again. Fill drink with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

title: Citronella Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half filled with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

title: Aqueduct
instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, shake ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

title: Virgin Sex On The Beach
instructions: Mix equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice. Mix in the nectar, and pour over ice. Pour in the grenadine last so it will sink. Garnish with pineapple.

title: Yellow Cake
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

title: St. Squiggle's Divorce
instructions: Just pour the glass 9/10's Coca-Cola, and add 1/10 Jolt Cola, and guzzle.

title: Dirty Bong Water
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a glass with ice. Mix and enjoy

title: Loose Caboose
instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, combine all ingredients and shake well. Strain into collins glass full of ice. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

title: Liquid Cocaine #6
instructions: Mix the alcohol in an 8-12oz glass. Cover and shake for about 3 seconds. Mix the juices together in a glass of your choice, (add ice for character), and pour in alcohol. Serve chilled.

title: Liquid Ecstasy
instructions: Build Bacardi, Midori, Blue Curacao, Lemon Juice and Pineapple Juice in that order over ice in a highball glass. Alternativly ingreadiants can also be placed in a shaker and shaken and strained into a martini glass. Add a slice of lemon to the highball glass or add a slice to the rim of the martini glass, add two straws and serve...

title: Alaskan Pipeline
instructions: Mix equal parts Yukon Jack and amaretto in a tumbler with ice and shake. Serve in shot glasses.

title: Cherry Popper
instructions: Pop cherry into strawberry schnapps / 7-up mix.

title: Cliffhanger
instructions: mix the kahlua, brandy, and irish creme and garnish with whipped creme. chill

title: Texas T
instructions: Make tea add tequila, and shake.

title: Kursk
instructions: Pour vodka and curacao in a glass filled with ice. Fill it up with Battery.

title: London Fog #2
instructions: Frappe in a highball glass.

title: Absinthe Flip
instructions: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

title: Absinthe Martini
instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass, swirl it around and then add the martini.

title: Absinthe Curacao Frappe
instructions: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add orange slice.

title: Absinthe Cocktail
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

title: Ladies Cocktail #2
instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into glass. Serve with piece of pineapple on top.

title: Absinthe Suissesse
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: Earthquake Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass.

title: Sazerac Cocktail
instructions: Chill an Old Fashioned glass by filling with crushed ice. In another glass mix the sugar with the bitters dissolving the sugar. Add some ice, stirring to chill. In the Old Fashioned glass remove the ice and pour in the absinthe coating the entire glass. Remove the excess absinthe. Add the Rye Whiskey and bitters/sugar mixture. Add the Lemon Twist.

title: T N T Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: Sea Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

title: Fuzzy Logic #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and enjoy!

title: Liquid Cocaine #7
instructions: Mix it all together in a champagne flute and drink away!!

title: Virgin Mary
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

title: Lara Croft
instructions: Shake. Serve in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

title: Fuzzy Nipple
instructions: Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into high ball and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

title: Hawaiian Punch #2
instructions: Build in hurricane (or collins glass) and stir.

title: Tokyo Rose
instructions: Mix equal parts in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

title: Dirty Bong Water #2
instructions: Blend, chill, and serve in 2-3 shot glasses.

title: Screaming Banana
instructions: Shake or mix with a straw.

title: Screwed Driver
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill with lemonade and add a dash of cranberry juice.

title: Kiddie Cocktail
instructions: Build in a highball glass. Add 7-up or Sprite over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

title: Limoncello
instructions: Soak skin of 7 lemons in alcohol for 2 days. Strain. Boil water and sugar and chill. Mix with alcohol. Store in the fridge.

title: Jamaican Ass-Kicker
instructions: Pour in the rum. Top with cola.

title: Almond Casa Noble
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except almond, then strain into a cocktail glass. Drop lime in glass.

title: Green Casa Noble
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except lime twist, then strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

title: Presticles Spectacles Wallet and Watch
instructions: Add all four ingredients into a small cup over ice

title: Black Cow
instructions: Pour root beer over ice cream and chocolate syrup in a large tumbler glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw and a long spoon.

title: Frozen Vanilla Honey Bee
instructions: Mix in blender at blend setting.

title: Dr. Debbie
instructions: Squeeze in the lemon slice and shoot it!

title: Nut and Honey
instructions: Combine and chill.

title: Carrot Cake #3
instructions: Fill shot glass to 1/3 with Peach Scnapps, then with 1/3 Bailey's Irish cream and float Glodschlager on top.

title: Paralyzer #3
instructions: In an 8 oz. glass mix Kalhua, Vodka, Rum, and Coke over ice. Fill rest of glass with Milk and stir.

title: Texas Tumbleweed
instructions: Blend until smooth.

title: French Russchian
instructions: Put the ice cubes in the glass, pour the Anisette in, fill with Schweppes Russchian

title: Dirty Ocean
instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice, add ingredients and mix. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

title: Millennium Knockout
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, add some ice, either 4 cubes or equivalent crushed. Add Galliano, brandy and vodka. Top up with orange juice. Shake and serve in a highball glass with a slice of orange.

title: Chocolate Otis
instructions: Add from darkest to lightest (Kahlua, Irish Creme, Bacardi 151). For a delightful twist, ignite the 151 for a Flaming Otis.

title: Zooom!
instructions: Layer the six ingredients in order. Be very careful not to let the baileys and grenadine mix.

title: Peach Daiquiri
instructions: Blend Ice until throughly crushed. Add Rum, Peach Nectar, and Schapps. Lightly blend until mixed well. Add Frozen Peaches. Blend until slushy. Enjoy

title: Tropical Tease
instructions: Pour direectly into a Hurricane glass with ice. Shake, do not stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.

title: Sicilian Cocktail
instructions: Fill glass with ice, then pour in all alcohol and milk and stir. If desired, garnish with whipped cream.

title: Pam's Root Beer Float
instructions: Fill the glass with ice, add 2 shots Irish Cream and fill with cola. Mix gently, it will be very foamy!

title: Brass Funky
instructions: Pour orange juice into Mickey's malt liquor.

title: Back-up Goalie
instructions: Pour together in a single container. Pour in to individual glasses. Just make sure the container is big enough for all the ingrediants.

title: Slim Shady
instructions: Pour in Scotch first, then the Guinness.

title: Bushwacker #5
instructions: Blend until smooth.

title: Aussie Riviter
instructions: Shake all four ingredients and strain into cocktail glass. Dash of lime is optional. Recipe can be doubled if needed.

title: Irish Twist
instructions: Pour Bailey's in glass. Add 2 cubes of ice. Add Irish Mist.

title: Pineapple Cocktail #2
instructions: Get a small pineapple, wash it, cut the top. Using a knife get some of the pulp of the pineapple. In a blender mix the pulp, vodka (best if it is left in the freezer), some ice and the honey. Pour the drink inside the pineapple again (without the ice) and put the top back again, do a small hole in the top and serve with a straw.

title: Carjacker
instructions: Fill shot glass of Hennessey and then drop it into a pint of malt liquor.

title: Ghetto Hell
instructions: Pour vodka in mason jar, add malt liquor.

title: Holy Blue
instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Blue Curacao. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

title: Lick-Her-Itch
instructions: Mix in a mixing glass with a little ice, Start with Sambuca, add vodka, and then cranberry juice. Shake and Strain into a rocks/shooter glass with no ice. Garnish with a single cherry.

title: Black Margarita
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with lime and rosary: invoke curse of choice.

title: Long Sigh
instructions: Pour equal measures of Chambord and Cognac into snifter. Swirl to mix. Microwave for 20-30 seconds - if it begins to bubble, stop heating!

title: Berry Patch
instructions: Combine the schnapps and creme de cacao in a Collins glass. Then fill the glass almost to the top with 7-up or Sprite, and top with half-and-half. Swirl with a straw before serving to give it a cloudy or milky appearance.

title: Sour Cow
instructions: Pour bourbon, fill rest of glass with cold chocolate milk. Drink it like a shot and enjoy.

title: Prince
instructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice. Garnish the drink with coconut flakes, half a passion fruit and mint leaves.

title: Flaming Confederate
instructions: Start with dash of grenadine. Layer godiva Liqueur, then float 151 proof rum. Light rum on fire. Blow out shot, then drink.

title: Chewybubu
instructions: Pour blue curacao into bottom third of shot glass, then, carefully pour the Ice 101 using an upside down spoon. Finally, fill remainder with J�germeister the same way.

title: Natalie Nosedive
instructions: Crush the ice cubes and fill the pitcher half way. Then pour in the vodka and the pink lemonade. Continue to pour in either the vodka or lemonade until you can barely taste the vodka. Stir.

title: JEE Sweet
instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker and serve in a chilled martini glass.

title: Berry Breeze
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 oz. each of Chambord, Kahlua, and Baileys. Top with cream. Short Shake.

title: Dillinger
instructions: Pour vodka and triple sec in glass, and pour milk into glass, then sprinkle cinnamon on top.

title: Blonde on Ice
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add creme de banane, followed by peppermint schnapps and vodka. Fill with cream. Short shake.

title: A Smile
instructions: With three ice cubes put vodka, light rum, cassis, orange juice, and frozen lemonade made at double strength into a shaker. Shake well. Place half the grenadine in the bottom of each white wine glass, pour in shaken mixture till withine inch of rim. With a large spoon drop whipped cream carefully in glass. Take small spoon spread to all the edges and to look nice. Serve. Makes two glasses.

title: Star Burst
instructions: Mix everything in the blender.

title: Peach Kazi
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice, shake and pour into a shot glass.

title: Sloe Gin Fizz
instructions: Pour sloe gin and lemon juice over ice in glass. Fill with soda. Garnish with cucumber stick or lemon peel.

title: Mexican Martini
instructions: Shake tequila and vermouth with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, add pepper slice.

title: Another Hot Day in Fresno
instructions: Pour in glass with ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir.

title: Limon Skyy
instructions: Add vodka, rum, and ice together in a shaker and shake well. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and add twist of lemon. Serve immediately after pouring.

title: Mandrin Sprite
instructions: Pour Absolut Mandrin into Collins glass and fill with Sprite. Stir gently.

title: Fragile Baby
instructions: Mix liquor ingredients, then add coffee to fill. Top off with whip cream and a cherry. Serve right away.

title: Gold Coast
instructions: Shake and pour into chilled cocktail or martini glass.

title: Terri's Tropical Passion
instructions: Pour into collins glass. Garnish with Cherries.

title: Cream in da Panties
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice, shake and then strain into shotglass

title: Monique
instructions: Mash the strawberries, fill up with milk, orange juice and tequila. Mix it and fill up with the soda and some ice, decorate with a strawberry.

title: Yin-Yang
instructions: Layer white chocolate liqueur over coffee liqueur. Enjoy.

title: Get Jenny
instructions: Pour gin, sweet and sour mix, and beer to a beer mug. Add ice and stir lightly.

title: Orange Drop
instructions: In mixing tin add liquors and simple syrup, splash oj, shake, and strain.

title: Metropolis
instructions: In a shaker, combine Vodka and blue curacao. Chill until cloudy. Pour into martini glass. Tilt glass and pour in raspberry schnapps (will sink to the bottom). Float cranberry vodka on top. This will give you levels of color: red - blue - purple.

title: Sweet Treat
instructions: Pour Tia Maria and Galliano over ice, and fill to taste with Coca Cola

title: Spiked Cherry
instructions: Shake gin and cherry juce. Fill with 7-up and ice.

title: Cadillac Margarita
instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, sour mix, and lime juice with ice. Pour over ice in salt-rimmed margarita glass. Float Grand Marnier on top. Garnish with slice of lime if desired.

title: Auger
instructions: Fill a Collin's glass about 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add all other ingredients, stir well, and enjoy.

title: Crase
instructions: Shake hard and fast, strain over ice.

title: Powdered Chocolate Donut
instructions: Pour equal parts of malibu rum and creme de cacao into a shot glass. Sprinkle the top lightly with powdered sugar.

title: The Incredible Hulk #2
instructions: Pour vodka and midori over ice in a highball glass. Add pineapple juice. Top off with a splash of 7-up.

title: Liquid Love
instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice. Pour vodka and amaretto into glass in equal parts. Then add two parts sour and pineapple juice.

title: Geeba
instructions: Pour OJ over ice. Add Midori and Absolut. Shake by flipping. Add Sprite. Garnish with orange slice.

title: Sunding Over the top
instructions: Pour the bacardi then the 7-up, sour mix and finally the russchian on top. Use a lot of ice.

title: Pimm's Cup New Orleans Style
instructions: In an ice filled collins glass, add Pimm's and lemonade. Top with 7-up or ginger ale. Garnish with cucuber slice.

title: Cointreauceptive
instructions: There are several ways to mix this drink. Pour the Bailey's over the ice and float the cointreau, or just mix it together. It usually needs a stir no matter.

title: Corfu Lule
instructions: Ice first, then the vodka, sour mix, almost as much orange juice and some sprite on the top.

title: Fruit Sangria
instructions: Pit cherries and soak in 2 oz. of the brandy. Slice peach and soak in the other 2 oz. of the brandy and all of the triple sec. Juice the lemon and orange into a pitcher and add the sugar syrup. Add the cherry and peach mixtures, and the red wine. Chill. To serve, fill a red wine glasses about 1/3 full with ice and add the alcohol/fruit mixture. Top with club soda to taste.

title: Puff's Magick Dragon
instructions: Pour all ingreedients in a punch bowl or large pitcher. Stir and add more liquid if needed.

title: White Mistress
instructions: Half fill glass with ice. Pour liqueurs into beaker, half full with ice. Pour in chilled hot chocolate. Shake gently. Strain into glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh banana dusted with chocolate powder.

title: Rudy
instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice and pour all ingredients in order and shake. Pour into same glass. Serve with lemon wedge and large straw.

title: Lost Cause
instructions: Pour Malibu, gin, and lime juice over ice. Stir in club soda.

title: Sister S.
instructions: Shake with ice, but not to hard - with passion & tenderness.

title: Blue Bahama
instructions: Mix gin, rum, vodka, tequila, triple sec, Midori, blue curacao and sour mix together. shake well and pour into Hurricane glass. Then add a splash of 7-up to the top and serve.

title: Sand In Your Crack
instructions: Shake and serve.

title: Bluuzberry Shake
instructions: Blend ingredients in blender until thoroughly mixed. Add more ice cream if too thin. Garnish with blueberries and strawberry.

title: Scottish Jersey
instructions: Pour first the scotch and then the cocoa over a lot of ice in a huge glass. The cocoa is going to melt 5-6 ice cubes, and it is always nice to have some left :)

title: Dutch Flag
instructions: Layer. Blue curacao first, then pina colada and last grenadine on top.

title: Turbulence
instructions: Pour in amaretto and southern comfort. Add 7-up and ice as desired.

title: The Dire
instructions: Pour Tonic Water and Rum equally over ice, and add a splash of orange juice and a lime.

title: Hawaiian Redneck
instructions: Combine rum, Southern Comfort, and pineapple juice in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into old fashioned glass. Add grenadine, just enough to give the classic "sunrise" effect. Stir before drinking.

title: Copper Cocktail
instructions: Shake rum, chartreuse, campari, and bitters in ice filled cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Sqeeze lime and drop into drink.

title: Bearsicle
instructions: Mix over ice. Serve.

title: White Parrot
instructions: Mix all ingredients and shake well.

title: Power Russian
instructions: Mix everything, but the ice in a blender, for about 30 seconds. Then you can either add the ice, and blend again, or simply pour the drink over the ice.

title: Vampyre Brew
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all ingredients, stir well.

title: Coffee Dreamer
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain over a large ice cube in a Red Wine glass.

title: Leap Frog
instructions: Over ice, add vodka, watermelon schnapps, blue maui,and o.j. Do not stir. Garnish with cherry and slice of orange.

title: Lazy Haze
instructions: Over ice, add peach schnapps, apple schapps, and orange juice to fill glass. Garnish with apple chunk and orange wedge.

title: The Green Monster
instructions: This is to be made up in a pint glass. Make up your basic snake bite, add the spirits, stir well, it goes bright green!

title: Exotic Pimms
instructions: Add the lemonade to the Pimms, then the passion fruit juice and finally a dash of ccranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, a slice of lime, cubes of cucumber and apple and a few mint leaves.

title: Classic Pimms
instructions: Stir, and add a slice of lemon and a few mint leaves.

title: Scandanavian Sun
instructions: Chill ingredients in a mixing tin over cracked ice. Stir gently and strain into cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with orange spiral.

title: Blue Russian Kiss
instructions: Mix Champagne, chilled Vodka, and blue curacao in glass. Over ice if desired.

title: Raspberry Southside
instructions: Shake all ingredients and pour over ice. You can garnish with mint leaves but I never do.

title: Absolut Symphony
instructions: Shake. Pour into glass and add Sprite. Garnish with a strawberry.

title: Lime Bomber
instructions: Fill blender with sherbet. Pour in 1 part vodka and 2 parts lime soda until blender is full. Mix well. For colder drinks add ice when putting ice cream in.

title: Kentucky Shitkicker
instructions: Mix ingredients together and splash coke. Drink is strong, but very flavorful.

title: Latana
instructions: Fill a pint glass half way with white wine. Then pour in sprite. Fill shot glass with raspberry liqueur and drop shot glass into pint glass.

title: Ladies Man
instructions: Blend all the ingredients together and pour into glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwifruit and sprinkle the top with chocolate.

title: Mt. Fujiyama
instructions: Fill an 8 Oz glass with Mt. Dew and warm sake. serve either chilled or warm.

title: Detroit Diesel
instructions: Pour, and stir gently.

title: Great Green Monster
instructions: Mix together and serve in a pitcher with ice.

title: Blue Neptune
instructions: Fill a shaker with vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice, and ice. Shake well. Strain into sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

title: Batida Summerday
instructions: Fill a 1/2 glass with crushed ice. Pour in batida de coco, pineapple juice and Kirschwasser. Stir. Last add 3 dashes grenadine over it. Serve with 2 short straws and garnish with trophical fruits.

title: Nut Case
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into old-fashioned glass on the rocks.

title: Sugared Rose
instructions: Shake and strain cranberry vodka into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add a splash of lemon juice and cranberry juice. For decoration, insert a stirrer through a slice of lemon to bridge over the glass.

title: A Better Melonball
instructions: Pack glass with ice. Pour the Midori in first, then add the Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-up.

title: Slow Screw up against a Red Wall
instructions: Pour shots over ice into shaker, add orange juice. Mix and pour into glass.

title: Nham Zoom
instructions: Pour a shot of vodka and a shot of brandy into a straight glass. Fill nearly to the top with orange juice. Then take a teaspoon of blackcurrant cordial and gently dribble it onto the surface of the drink so it slowly sinks down to make a lovely pattern. Add a straw, so the drinkee can create swirls if desired.

title: Banana Splat
instructions: In blender, mix banana liquer, rum, chocolate liquer, creme de cacao and milk with ice and blend until smooth. Pour into either red wine glass or rocks glass, top with a dollop of whipped cream, sprinkle of nutmeg and a cherry on top. Use a VERY light touch with the Malibu.

title: A 243
instructions: Pour the vodka, the licor 43 and the blue curacao in a glass and stir. Fill up with soda and some ice cubes.

title: Incredible Hulk #2
instructions: For one shot, just mix right in the shot glass. For a larger amount, use a shaker with the same proportions.

title: Anime Freak
instructions: Shake Tropico, Midori, Cranberry Juice, and 7-Up on the rocks. Serve in a glass with no ice.

title: Listerine
instructions: Combine in a shot glass.

title: The Great Hercules
instructions: Shake all ingridients but the Sprite. Pour into a highball glass and top with the Sprite.

title: Strawberry Soak
instructions: Sprinkle sugar over diced strawberries, and toss by hand in a bowl. Pour Alize over strawberries, and let soak for 15 min. to a half an hour. Strain mixture well, and store in Alize bottle for later use. Will yeild more than a bottle, so have another empty bottle ready in reserve.

title: Blazing Fire
instructions: In mixing glass, pour in equal parts vodka, gin, rum, and triple sec. Add pineapple juice and a hearty dash of grenadine for color. Shake and strain over ice, garnish with orange and cherry spear. It should come out a bright, fiery orange color.

title: Captain's Treasure
instructions: Pour in shot glass, make sure you have some gold flakes in it.

title: Fuzzy Buccaneer
instructions: Mix 1 part rum, 1 part peach schnapps, and 2 parts O. J. and shake. Pour over crushed ice. Also makes a great frozen drink when blended like a frozen daiquiri

title: Nuclear Mantis
instructions: Stir in a collins glass.

title: Blue Suede Shoes
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Shake and strain.

title: Mellow Tennessee
instructions: Pour Jack Daniels into highball glass. Add ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale and finish off by topping it with orange juice.

title: Disco LemOnade
instructions: Fill the Collins glass with ice, then add in the sloe gin, Bacardi Limon and triple sec. Fill with Lemonade and shake. Top the drink with a circle of blue curacao, stir and garnish with a lemon wheel.

title: Red Haus
instructions: Fill the highball glass with ice, then add the Black Haus and sloe gin. Fill with cranberry juice, shake and serve with a cherry garnish.

title: Mind Meld
instructions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice, then add the blue curacao, triple sec and peach schnapps. Fill with 7-up and garnish with an orange wheel.

title: Good & Plenty
instructions: Pour anisette, then Kahlua in a shot glass.

title: Eye of Swamp
instructions: Build in highball with lots of ice. Fill with Sprite.

title: Tootsie Roll #2
instructions: Pour over ice.

title: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
instructions: Put about 8 ounces of crushable ice cubes in a blender with blades that are capable of crushing ice. Add 8 oz of frozen (but thawed) strawberries in sugar sauce. (Available in the frozen foods section of your grocery store). Add sweet and sour mix and tequila. (Triple sec is not needed due to sweetness in strawberry sauce). Blend until desired consistency is obtained. Pour in large clear glass and garnish with a strawberry if available and a straw.

title: Cotton Candy #2
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the ingredients. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail (martini) glass.

title: Vulva
instructions: Over rocks, combine schnapps, rum, and triple sec in Collins glass. Fill with orange juice and shake. Serve.

title: L.A. Riot
instructions: Fill half a shot glass with Kahlua, and pour on Baileys in a separate layer, nearly to the top of the glass. Add a small amount of green chartreuse to float on the top. Light the drink on fire and sprinkle over cinnamon. Drink through a straw while still on fire.

title: Wife Beater
instructions: Combine in shaker. Shake untill cloudy. Pour.

title: Tequilaville
instructions: Shake and pour over ice

title: Cherry Garden
instructions: Pour all spirits into cocktail shaker and add cream. Gently mix. Fill glass 2/3 with ice. Pour contents of shaker into glass over the ice. Gently dash grenadine into glass. Garnish with speared cherry.

title: Cherry Candycane
instructions: Pour ingredients into glass and mix thoroughly

title: I go to Purdue
instructions: First pour the aftershock and then the vodka then pour the bacardi down the back side of a spoon to finish the shot.

title: Hubbabubba
instructions: Mix in the glass.

title: CT
instructions: Fill a long-drink glass with ice cubes. Add cognac and fill with tonic water. Put half a slice of lemon in the glass.

title: Yah Yah
instructions: Pour the alcohol (except 151 proof rum) and ice first, then fill with orange juice. Top off with 151 proof rum. Optional, garnish with orange wedge, cherry and pineapple chunk.

title: Strawberry Blond
instructions: Layer in the order given: Irish Cream, Creme de Cacao, Strawberry Liqueur.

title: Man In A Man Suit
instructions: Shake the fruit juice and add it to the bowl (make sure it is pure fruit juice), mix in the vodka, whisky and southern comfort. Carefully float the 151 proof rum on the top, light it, but snuff it out before it all burns off. Several people drink it from the bottom with a straw at the same time.

title: French 76
instructions: Shake the first five ingredients with plenty of ice. Strain into a frozen cocktail glass, fill to the brim with champagne and add a long twist of fresh orange peel

title: Senorita Margarita
instructions: Mix tequila, triple sec, lime juice, sour mix, and orange juice. Strain into margarita glass with a salted rim, over ice. Garnish with a lime.

title: Serial Killer
instructions: Mix liquor, juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into ice filled highball glass.

title: Hawaiian Sunrise
instructions: Pour in rum, then vodka follow with Pineapple juice. Drop in grenadine last - let settle for a sunrise effect.

title: Faust
instructions: Use chilled liquor. Pour the J�germeister in first, then add Yukon Jack, and finally add 151 Rum.

title: Jamestown Kool-Aid
instructions: Make the kool-aid as usual, then mix in the J�germeister, Yukon Jack, and 151 rum in this order. Chill for two hours, serve.

title: Risk
instructions: Mix all three chilled in this order: Aftershock, Orange Juice, and Yukon Jack

title: Sackville Surprise
instructions: Rum first, syrup second. Mix well in shot glass.

title: Two Turtles
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

title: Satin Sheets
instructions: Combine kahlua, Irish cream, and chocolate liqueur over ice. Add milk to fill the glass.

title: Tea Toddy #2
instructions: Make some tea, put it in the cup, half full. Fill up with Baileys to taste. Add a splash of Whisky (optional) to taste

title: Sloppy Joe
instructions: Pour cranberry and orange juice in cup, then add the sprite. Last, add the rum.

title: Sperm Whale
instructions: Over ice pour Southern Comfort, Peach Schnapps and Malibu Rum. Top off with Pineapple Juice. Shake and pour into glass.

title: Absolute Chainsaw
instructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

title: Trailer Wench
instructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

title: LaPaglia's Punch
instructions: Shake everything and serve on the rocks

title: Cheesecake
instructions: Mix equal parts of irish cream and pineapple juice in mixing tin filled with ice. Don't shake, just stir lightly. Pour genadine in glass and layer mixture on top.

title: Green Label
instructions: Build in an ice filled glass. Serve. Great as a frozen drink.

title: Brass Skunky
instructions: Mix it all together. Serve cold, but not with ice.

title: Crap Schnapps
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain

title: Fuzznutts
instructions: Just pour equally in shot glass

title: Bluetail Fly
instructions: Pour all ingredients in shaker over ice. Shake well and pour in 12 oz. collins glass.

title: Bulldozer
instructions: Pour a full pint of the malt liquor into a chilled 20 ounce mug or stein, then dump a healthy 2 ounce shot of 151 rum right into the middle of it.

title: Crazy Maker
instructions: Mix southern comfort and cranberry juice in a glass. Layer orange juice on the top. Squeeze lime over the top of the drink.

title: Invisible Parrot
instructions: Stir.

title: Pirate's Punch
instructions: Combine over ice in a highball glass and stir.

title: Sunrise
instructions: Mix liqueur, vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Add some ice and fill the glass with ginger ale (or Sprite if you don't have ginger ale). Decorate with a slice of orange.

title: Baroness
instructions: Mix juices and cinnamon with ice. Strain to a cocktail glass. Serve cold.

title: Power Sangria
instructions: Fill a wine glass with 1/3 chilled vermouth and 2/3 red wine.

title: Participle
instructions: Mix liqueur, juice and vodka in a highball glass. Add ice and fill the glass with sprite. You can decorate the drink with a slice of orange, lemon or kiwi if you want.

title: Chocolate Martini #4
instructions: Pour the vodka and creme de cacao into a shaker with the ice cubes. Rub a slice of orange peel around the rim of the cocktail glass and dip the cocktail glass into the cocoa powder. Strain the liquid into the Cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange peel.

title: Okapi
instructions: Stir all of the ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.

title: Packerita
instructions: Place four ice cubes in a glass. Add tequila and triple sec. Fill almost to top with pineapple juice, and add a splash of Blue Curacao. Squeeze lime wedge over drink (optional). Mix thoroughly and enjoy immensely.

title: Drunk-N-ade
instructions: Put everything into a shaker. Toss in ice and shake (shaking is easier than stirring). Pour contents into whatever glassware you have.

title: Moulin Rouge
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

title: Jungle Boogie Punch
instructions: Make a sugar syrup by boiling brown sugar, water and orange peel for 30 minutes, then allow it to cool. Stir it together with the other ingredients in a large bowl. Garnish with chunks of pineapple, mango and orange, and sprinkle with freshly grated nutmeg before serving.

title: Hawaiian Sugar Plantation
instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass.

title: Brioni
instructions: Pour liquor over ice cubes in a Collins glass. Fill with club soda, stir to mix, and add orange slice for garnish.

title: Shore Breeze
instructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

title: Southampton
instructions: Pour tonic water over ice in a highball glass. Add a squeeze of lime and Angostura bitters. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wheel.

title: Moon Pie
instructions: Layer. Coffee liqueur first, banana liqueur on top.

title: Blue Wave
instructions: Shake Hpnotiq, white wine, OJ and ginger ale with ice. Pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with sliced green apples, green grapes, orange slice and kiwi slices.

title: The Blue Fin
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

title: Blue Goose
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Grnish with an orange twist.

title: White Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: Ibsen
instructions: Shake with ice, then strain into ice filled whisky glass. Garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon sprinkled on top.

title: Cranberry Apple Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

title: Fraise de Champagne
instructions: Pour into a coupette glass/champagne saucer.

title: Washington Apple Martini
instructions: Shake and serve up in a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and cinnamon.

title: Gotland Summer Night
instructions: Pour gin, Cointreau and orange juice over ice. Gently pour grenadine along the inside of the glass so it sinks to the bottom.

title: Jameson St. Patrick's Day
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange spiral.

title: Sour Apple Martini
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple.
